Subject: üòä The Pleasure Game
Body Text:
Hey friends,

This week, I wanted to share another pretty cool thing that I learned at one of Joe Hudson's Art of Accomplishment (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWx8LB7p0nGDW6dMppl7x-hBRW7bJF9w5mT48PN9k7M9W3pyd0W7lCdLW6lZ3nZW2S9M254PPjR4W1t9syQ5JX5SnW1ZGh3S6k-GNnW37KSX4147Tr0W1JRn0n83wqXHW1bnXk11K8kQlW8dc6Zw4rNtyPW1Twnp65JLc_XW7sndHR5Bxg6XW583RnS6M4SplW6gsGKP1BW1Z5W8SxPjk77843TVd-bP-3r1vCGW5wPSdM6v5-jZW8GbZlH6mbSYPW35m8Bh2hyhC6W8mvLGC594xN5W2Q4Fwg7rdYPfW35z1fB7B_hbHW6HsDn92yx2VpW2hppLd6q5lYyW2RKTrG7pY44hW2njXqr8tRyl5W85XrYS4LYW-Df7gfDcl04 ) retreats (which I've been going on about for the past few weeks).

It's called "The Pleasure Game" - and even though it was just a 10-minute exercise during our 7-day retreat, it's one of those things that's really stuck with me.

Here's how it works:

For the next 10 minutes, you challenge yourself to feel as much pleasure as you possibly can in whatever you're doing. That's it. The only goal is to feel pleasure.

When they introduced this at the retreat, I found myself:

- Taking a deep breath and noticing how nice it felt to just... breathe
- Getting up from the couch and appreciating how it felt to move my body
- Walking outside and feeling the warmth of sunlight on my skin
- Touching a tree and experiencing the texture of bark under my fingertips
- Sitting in a nearby chair and noticing how good it felt to just... sit
- Playing with my wedding band and enjoying both how it looked and felt (plus the nice memory of my wife who wasn't there with me)

When the bell rang to signal the end of our 10 minutes, I had this weird moment of "oh wait, I don't want this to be over" - which is pretty wild considering I was basically doing nothing. My only goal was to feel pleasure.

But here's where it gets interesting...

Since the retreat, I've been playing this game more and more in my daily life. While washing dishes, I'll challenge myself: "How can I feel more pleasure in this moment?" When I'm just sitting on the sofa or having a meal, same question: "How can I feel more pleasure right now?"

I'm actually writing this while on a walk (speaking into VoicePal (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWx8LB7p0nGDW6dMppl7x-hBRW7bJF9w5mT48PN9k7Mbv3pyd0W8wLKSR6lZ3q1W7rjl594fgGldW3-4lmc1x3ynQW4FDmDv8c2fk9W1TZKNT6FQvF2W6_tm_78C86YjW1gK3Mr4J4Y4BW686Zlq6vG-F9N6xvr-GR2pFkW2n0BqQ6-S4VZW1q7PpP6M0_NdW26hDDq1RR9slW3yZb2Q4rZ8dPW5cWcnr7C2W7CW4GrTSb7LM8W5W3lwT1-7lt9STN248HnwSLwfSW65985-7ZSCvsN3Cm4GP8LKt4W7m4fbp7rbtRHVBClr41zJzq_W33QclZ7rjhz9N5DGgtg_bT7JW6chPqG8HCdTYW6qZ8_M2FvgfHW4kGFDS3G795wW5N0n4h3gYj15Vvqx8V1WF1BbW7srC7k4fRBsJf7lLBcP04 ) , the app my team and I built to make writing more fun üòâ). I've been walking for about 20 minutes with my AirPods in, just speaking thoughts out loud which the app transcribes. But even as I'm saying these words, just priming my brain to feel more pleasure makes me notice:

- The wind on my skin
- Getting unexpectedly sprayed by a sprinkler (and how refreshing that feels)
- The ground under my feet
- How powerful my legs feel
- The beautiful scenery around me

Here's the cool thing about the pleasure game - it's always available to us. In every moment, you can create this little partition in your brain with just one goal: feel as much pleasure as possible right now.

You can play it:

- While working at your computer
- During household chores
- When eating food
- Even while taking a dump (yep, he went there)

In every moment, there's so much more pleasure available than what we usually default to. But often, all it takes to enjoy ourselves more is to just set that as an intention. I forget this a lot, but I'm trying to remind myself more and more.

Have a great week!

Ali xx

Kajabi's Creator Class (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWx8LB7p0nGDW6dMppl7x-hBRW7bJF9w5mT48PN9k7M9C3pyd0W6N1vHY6lZ3n8W11Wzwn8dvPZWW3h5v6S7BwLrGW71_Tg-8kTySBVHZCHc4R4QlwW9bcpGw7t0By-VQlQh93PN-NgW2T-R_-19Kp0HW46bp7_2rFG11W6NDBq63hw28SW64L94Q6s6c6KW8DvHR37BsX7xW6cnhRJ1QryssN7XrHjb7002DW5_yxJf2DvQpHN4ZLF8n17-C8W7dSCcZ2vnLbxVR_vlQ6fs-8QVpLYXD5lX-XBW6HWKvl1gJz7PVB8kg58ZwnP9W82DZ7Q19h_yTW10M_dl1LK6rvf2_gJyg04 )

The creator economy is an exciting place - you can basically make money by working on your passions all day. But, it can be confusing, too. You might have lots of questions around how to actually build a business as a creator - which is why I‚Äôve teamed up with Kajabi.

Kajabi allows you to monetise your passion by helping you build courses, communities, memberships, and coaching products. They‚Äôre all about making a creator economy that works for everyone, and they‚Äôve made a huge difference to my business over the years. They‚Äôre currently running Creator Class (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWx8LB7p0nGDW6dMppl7x-hBRW7bJF9w5mT48PN9k7M9C3pyd0W6N1vHY6lZ3n8W11Wzwn8dvPZWW3h5v6S7BwLrGW71_Tg-8kTySBVHZCHc4R4QlwW9bcpGw7t0By-VQlQh93PN-NgW2T-R_-19Kp0HW46bp7_2rFG11W6NDBq63hw28SW64L94Q6s6c6KW8DvHR37BsX7xW6cnhRJ1QryssN7XrHjb7002DW5_yxJf2DvQpHN4ZLF8n17-C8W7dSCcZ2vnLbxVR_vlQ6fs-8QVpLYXD5lX-XBW6HWKvl1gJz7PVB8kg58ZwnP9W82DZ7Q19h_yTW10M_dl1LK6rvf2_gJyg04 ) with other industry leaders and myself, so you can learn what it takes to make a creator business really work.

Myself, Justin Welsh, Natalie Ellis, Brendon Burchard, and Dominique Broadway will be sharing our insights from our work as creators. Between the five of us we have over 50 years of combined experience, a collective following of nearly 20 million, and more than $53 million in revenue generated.

With HeyGen, ANYONE can create videos 10x faster and cheaper than traditional production. Learn about the new magic here.¬†

Prompt Videos of Yourself

Now, you can generate videos of yourself in any location, outfit, pose, and style from a simple text prompt. No filming needed. Just upload a photo, and create lifelike scenes in seconds. If you can describe it, we can generate videos of it. Unleash your creativity with our new text-to-video technology.¬†

Try generating a new professional headshot, you in your next Halloween costume, or a personal greeting in a Santa hat. Generate those looks, and then bring them to life by adding motion.¬†

( https://app.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=November+Newsletter+Free+Users&utm_content=V4+From+Text+to+Video%3A+Unleash+November%E2%80%99s+Best+HeyGen+Features&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )
With our new ‚ÄòAdd Motion‚Äô feature, not only does your avatar move with your script, but it also brings the background to life. Think waves crashing, cars passing by, or leaves blowing in the wind.¬†

The future of storytelling is here with HeyGen.¬†

Try it free ( http://app.heygen.com/avatars?listType=talking-photo&showGenerateLooks=true&utm_campaign=November+Newsletter+Free+Users&utm_content=V4+From+Text+to+Video%3A+Unleash+November%E2%80%99s+Best+HeyGen+Features&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )
Virtual Avatar with Motion

No cast? No wardrobe? No location scout? No problem.¬†

In mere seconds, you can now design your own virtual characters and brand ambassadors in any outfit, pose, and background.¬†

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs inspiring our early users:¬†

A creator behind a meditation video series can prompt avatars that guide sessions from sanctuaries in Bhutan and the Himalayas

Video Translation

HeyGen is the leader in video translation, using AI magic to go beyond dubbing and to do more than just lip-syncing. We know a great translation depends on sound quality. So, we‚Äôre letting you remove sound you don‚Äôt want and sharpen the sound you do want. You can now remove background music to make the speaker‚Äôs voice distinct and check the box for voice enhancement to automatically improve voice quality.

Try these in your next translations ( https://app.heygen.com/voices?create_video_modal=true&modal_screen=translate_upload&utm_campaign=November+Newsletter+Free+Users&utm_content=V4+From+Text+to+Video%3A+Unleash+November%E2%80%99s+Best+HeyGen+Features&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )
AI Screen Recorder (Beta)

Now, you can add HeyGen avatars to your screen recordings to send a message while keeping the camera off. Record your screen with our voice-only Google Chrome extension, and then HeyGen will automatically open, letting you edit and add your avatar. Choose your digital twin or one of our diverse cast members.¬†

Subject: Lesson 4 is ready!
Body Text:
Hi Candace,

¬†

Today I want to talk to you about something really personal‚Ä¶

You see, 7 years ago I set myself a mission to impact 1 billion lives.

But I can‚Äôt do it alone‚Äî that‚Äôs where you come in.

¬†

I need people who are passionate about helping and serving others to join my mission.

But first, we need to create a blueprint for what YOUR life coaching business will look like.

Because there are all kinds of people who need help - with many different problems.

In today‚Äôs lesson I‚Äôll help you get one step closer to discovering your own purpose‚Ä¶

And hopefully, when you‚Äôre ready, you‚Äôll sign up to join my mission too.

¬†

But for now, make sure you watch today‚Äôs lesson and discover what YOUR mission will be as a life coach.

And how to create a blueprint that will make this new career path easier and more rewarding.

‚áí Click here to watch today‚Äôs lesson now ( https://pages.jayshettycoaching.com/jscs-pathway-day-4-funnel/?el=day-4-email-2-pathway-funnel&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+VSL%2FPathway+Funnel&utm_content_name=D4E2+Pathway&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io ) ‚áê

Or download the lesson book at this link. ( https://drive.google.com/file/d/1snkJPrSJocHh7k-oDVu-n2czJpj-cKUp/view?usp=sharing/?el=day-4-email-2-pathway-funnel&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+VSL%2FPathway+Funnel&utm_content_name=D4E2+Pathway&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )

There are only 2 lessons left!

Check your inbox tomorrow for the 5th lesson, where I‚Äôll talk about THE MOST important aspect of being a life coach.

Don‚Äôt miss this one.

Speak to you tomorrow‚Äî 4pm time.

-Jay Shetty, Jay Shetty Certification School

Subject: The Secret to Productivity
Body Text:
View in browser (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VXcz3G953SYXW6KvnBG15VjBkW20x2Jc5kSy7DN7vvr0l5n4LbW6N1X8z6lZ3pZW662xpQ13XVTZW94GnVH22sGrQN6Tc_0hwqyM7W2K0wyY5LfKFJW5FH64q1NzLPtVjFcTJ2qkB5NW4WrCVj1VK-m_Mb-z6Ypxl5FVG93JH3MVndQW8vXGDd6fGLK0W27-zjr8DSGqFVk8ZrT1Hz5mVW28rWxV6v-C93W1T0s237RYk4TW6J7W6Y5dcG2sW8Xf42C1L_VFGV_yQTT3yD2HpW1d9GkR1v42FZW5nxj-v3NJVzBW7ncn4K4dYZ6wN15n4nCfhl0TW7nQ__p84r0lhVy7ngw4htwGkN82jDTRJnfxqV8j4962c1RyRW2CDQfF2-Qr88W2Sbzh356CmKXW7qTQYN79xL35W642DGS8rMN-mW1z_dF49jk9G0W4CdmzH6JMFfHVwPh4N7w2Qh8W213l1Y2sVLl3W7dvQ895XK2ycW36Jwqd2q1GtZW3t4R5L74xr-KW6Fv22g4Q0Sv-W2ZLWw_830_bLf4mVrZP04 )

Hey Candace,

Last time I told you all about why I started Productivity Lab (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VXcz3G953SYXW6KvnBG15VjBkW20x2Jc5kSy7DN7vvr1d3pyd0W8wLKSR6lZ3pyW1J6hWq9jsQrJW3Z769t1cwKQcN8HkN6R3SrWDW5B1kJ65Y8BJVW58pnFz8rhhSdW7fZPhz3K9STrN6dMB-QCxCBjW5qSJY14YvHFFW8Xdrml4LR93_W6NJR-44yqb1VW3B4zsk71YjZWW3-xvBm8BlwLDW5LM5Nq1XKcBlW2rQxMR3C4FPKW2kKNQJ89lr4hW5hQwsj5j9332W8XVQ9q350Bd3MM5c_Frwqh9W4WVrJf8wSc7-W7hv4Qv39pVh_W8yS35J7kPnv4W4hqH5b18-s1nW8-VnvR4Q6M76W5Lc-2f7_22BTW9c-4Jg14Cp3XW6rvdv84rfSS4W566Y4B7BXmCbW7Qmswn3Th56Zf2nYqw604 ) .

Today, I want to talk about the secret sauce to feel-good productivity. Plus, I want to give you a peek into what‚Äôs inside Productivity Lab üëÄ

While writing my book, I found three keys to making our work feel good: play, power, and people.

In short, work feels good when we have fun, feel in control, and find ways ways to connect with others. And when we feel good, we get more done.

ü•≥ Play keeps work fun. Maybe it's turning tasks into games or not taking ourselves too seriously.

üí™ Power lets us shape our work and see good results.

üôè People around us give us energy and push us forward.

So, when building the Productivity Lab community, I knew how important it was to include all three of these things in mind.

You see, most online communities don‚Äôt last. People lose interest. There‚Äôs no real purpose. Or there‚Äôs simply not enough value.

We didn‚Äôt want this to happen with Productivity Lab. Instead, we wanted it to be a place that would truly change how you work, keep you coming back, and offer you genuine support in your journey to doing more of what matters to you.

For instance, inside the Lab you‚Äôll find:

- Productivity workshops, co-working sessions, and a 90 day productivity programme to help you build a personalised productivity system
- Feedback and support from our productivity coaches
- A community of ambitious entrepreneurs, creators and professionals, just like you
- And a lot more‚Ä¶

We‚Äôve put so much effort into this community to make sure it‚Äôs fun, personalised, and inspiring, while helping you to have fun and make friends along the way.

In short, we want it to be the best productivity community out there. And I think we‚Äôve done a pretty good job so far.

But don‚Äôt take my word for it, we‚Äôve already had a tonne of incredible feedback from our members telling us how Productivity Lab has changed their life:

And, I‚Äôm super excited to be opening up the doors to Productivity Lab once again next week üéâ

Next time, I'll tell you how we built this from the ground up and what you'll find inside.

Talk soon!

Ali xx

Sent with ‚ù§Ô∏è from Ali Abdaal Ltd.

16-19 Eastcastle Street , Fitzrovia, London, W1W 8DY, United Kingdom

Subject: Notification from DataExpert.io Community Academy from Zach Wilson
Body Text:
Alert from DataExpert.io Community Academy Company Logo [https://content.techcreator.io/logo/2-logo.png]
 CONGRATS ON MAKING IT THROUGH WEEK 1!!
 * if you haven‚Äôt gotten through the first 6 videos on dimensional data modeling
   by the point, you are officially behind! 
   
   
 * use the weekend to figure out the homework. It‚Äôs a beast! 
   
   
 * if you don‚Äôt submit homework one by Monday, you are officially behind! 
   
   
 * as a treat next week, I‚Äôll be hosting a homework doers only Q&A where you can
   ask me questions directly in a smaller setting! This won‚Äôt be recorded and
   only for homework doers! 
   
   
 * one random homework doer from week 1 will also get free entry into the AI
   boot camp that starts July 7th

Subject: We miss you, Candace!
Body Text:
Swing Education ( https://swingeducation.com/?customer_id=e6fd030bef5780ea14 )
Hi Candace,

¬†

It‚Äôs been a few weeks since we last connected about substitute teaching opportunities with us so we wanted to reconnect to understand how we can best support you at this moment in time. Here are a few options for your review:¬†

*
Forgot which step you are on? No problem! When you are ready, you can log in here ( https://subs.swingeducation.com/?customer_id=e6fd030bef5780ea14#/ ) to finish up your remaining steps.
*
Need help? We‚Äôve got a fantastic team that is solely dedicated to supporting our substitutes through onboarding and beyond. You can chat with them through our website or simply reply to this email.
*
No longer interested? ¬†We fully understand that life changes fast. We get it! Even if this is not a fit at this time, you can always come back to teach with us. And we hope that you do! Simply submit your information here and we‚Äôll update your status in our system. ( https://swingeducation.typeform.com/to/L0l3UpDb?customer_id=e6fd030bef5780ea14 )

With gratitude,

Your Swing Education Team

‚Ää

Subject: Learning Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (Online) M.S.Ed. - Priority Deadline for 2025 is Tomorrow!
Body Text:
Last chance to apply

                                      February 1 priority deadline for Learning Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (Online) M.S.Ed.                                    





Priority Deadline Tomorrow:
                                      February 1, 2025                                    


                                      Dear Candace,

                                      Thank you for taking the first step toward joining our community of changemakers and innovators.

The priority deadline for Learning Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (Online) is approaching on February 1. Submitting your application by this date waives the application fee, maximizes your financial aid opportunities, and ensures priority consideration for admission.

All required application materials must be submitted by 11:59 PM (ET) tomorrow, Saturday, February 1, 2025, to guarantee review. Applications received after the priority deadline will be considered as space in the program permits.                                    


Submit Your Application <http://apply.gse.upenn.edu/apply/?utm_campaign=feb1_1day_2025&utm_medium=email&utm_source=deadline>
                                      If you have questions about the application process or would like to connect with our admissions team, contact us <https://www.gse.upenn.edu/admissions/information?utm_campaign=feb1_1day_2025&utm_medium=email&utm_source=deadline> by email at admissions@gse.upenn.edu or by phone at (215) 898-6415.
                                                                           

                                      We look forward to reviewing your application!

                                      Sincerely,

                                      Leslie M. Levin
                                      Vice Dean of Admissions and Student Affairs

                                      University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education
                                      3700 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, PA 19104
                                      (215) 898-6415 | admissions@gse.upenn.edu





UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA GRADUATE SCHOOL OF EDUCATION
                                                                           

                                      3700 Walnut Street
                                      Philadelphia, PA 19104

Subject: Your billing account ‚Äú01326E-BE58B2-069E6E‚Äù is closed.
Body Text:
Google Cloud Platform Go to my console ¬ª




We're writing to confirm your billing account ‚Äú01326E-BE58B2-069E6E‚Äù hasbeen closed by one of your billing administrators.


What happens now?



All billable services (eg VM instances) in any projects linked to theaccount will stop.
We will bill you for the usage you accrued prior to cancelling yourservice. This bill will be the last bill you receive, unless you reactivateservice.



If you want to reopen ‚Äú01326E-BE58B2-069E6E‚Äù, sign in to the Manage billingaccounts page in the Google Cloud Console. Learn more







The Google team





Google Plus Twitter Blogger

Subject: A message from future-you
Body Text:
Hey there!

Only 4 days left to get your copy of Low-Ticket Launchpad (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/xmug633xvgf3urr8q89u5h2833kllfn/e0ho32m9c0u7lpnq9pf7/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
) and become a Digital Product Builder.

After Monday, April 14th, it‚Äôll be gone‚Ä¶ forever.

So, if you‚Äôre still on the fence, we want to ask you this 1
question:

************************************
‚ÄúWhere will you be a year from now?‚Äù
************************************

What happens if you don‚Äôt take action today?

* If you DON‚ÄôT join Low-Ticket Launchpad
‚Äã
* If you DON‚ÄôT create and sell your first $350 digital product
(and future-proof yourself in a rapidly changing world)
‚Äã
* If you DON‚ÄôT take this opportunity to monetize your knowledge,
expertise, and experience that‚Äôs locked up inside your head
‚Äã
* If you DON‚ÄôT use these frameworks (that have made us over
$15,000,000) but try and figure it out alone

Where will you be a year from now?

*********************************************
But what happens if you do take action today?
*********************************************

* If you DO join Low-Ticket Launchpad
‚Äã
* If you DO create and sell your first $350 digital product (and
future-proof yourself in a rapidly changing world)
‚Äã
* If you DO take this opportunity to monetize your knowledge,
expertise, and experience that‚Äôs locked up inside your head
‚Äã
* If you DO use these frameworks that have made us over
$15,000,000 selling digital products (rather than going it alone)

Where will you be a year from now?

If you choose not to, your life a year from now won‚Äôt look too
different.

‚Äã
But if you choose to take the first step‚Ä¶ who knows?

What if it leads to something better than you could have ever
imagined?

******************************
Then what are you waiting for?
******************************

THIS IS THE MOMENT!

Future-You is calling, asking, BEGGING for you to do something
different.

Because, the reason you think you can‚Äôt build your own $350
digital product is the reason why you should grab this
opportunity with both hands and run with it.

Use this as a way to:

* Overcome your self-doubt
* Rapidly accelerate your growth by embracing the unknown
* Turn what you think are limitations into motivation to go in a
new, exciting direction

Every time we start something new, we feel exactly the same.

But we know this is part of the process of growing & increasing
our earning potential:

‚Äã

**************************************************
Which means, right now, you have to make a choice.
**************************************************

Are you going to just sit there and accept the way things are?

Or are you going to take ACTION and finally do something
different‚Äîto put yourself on a new trajectory?

Whenever we make a decision like this, we always think about what
Future-Us would be happy Present-Us did today.

And we make decisions with our Future-Selves in mind.

(Plus, kudos to you for taking the time to think this
through‚Äîit‚Äôs what so many of our most successful students do.)

So, as we start Q2 of 2025, will you invest in yourself?

Put the last 3 months behind you and start afresh.

And we promise, this time next year, you‚Äôll be happy you did.

Just remember‚Ä¶

*********************************************
You have 4 days to join Low-Ticket Launchpad.
*********************************************

After Monday, April 14th, it will disappear‚Ä¶ forever.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
‚ÄãClick here to join 300+ others inside Low-Ticket Launchpad. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/xmug633xvgf3urr8q89u5h2833kllfn/e0ho32m9c0u7lpnq9pf7/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
)‚Äã
-----------------------------------------------------------------

We hope to see you inside‚Äîbecause we know it‚Äôs going to be a
life-changing experience for you.

Chat soon,

Dickie & Cole

PS‚Ä¶ Want to master the frameworks we‚Äôve shown other creators?

Then hop aboard Low-Ticket Launchpad.

It contains all the digital product advice and frameworks we‚Äôve
given to other creators over the last few years (including Ali
Abdaal).

‚ÄãClick here to get started & finally monetize all the knowledge
sitting in your head. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/xmug633xvgf3urr8q89u5h2833kllfn/e0ho32m9c0u7lpnq9pf7/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
)‚Äã

‚Äã

If you'd like to update your email settings, choose one of the
options below:

* No longer want to get updates about our new product, Low Ticket
Launchpad? Don't worry‚Äîclick here to opt-out from any future
emails about this training. (

Subject: [Day 2 Assignments] 5-Day Gen AI Intensive
Body Text:
Kaggle


Hello Candace,

üéí Today's Assignments

Complete Unit 2: ‚ÄúEmbeddings and Vector Stores/ Databases‚Äù:


Listen to the summary podcast episode for this unit.
To complement the podcast, read the ‚ÄúEmbeddings and Vector Stores/Databases‚Äù whitepaper.
Complete these codelabs on Kaggle:


Build a RAG question-answering system over custom documents.
Explore text similarity with embeddings.
Build a neural classification network with Keras using embeddings.

Want to have an interactive conversation? Try adding the whitepaper toNotebookLM.

üí° What You'll Learn

Today you will learn about the conceptual underpinning of embeddings andvector databases, and how they can be used to bring live or specialist datainto your LLM application. You'll also explore their geometrical powers forclassifying and comparing textual data as well as how to evaluateembeddings.

üìã Reminders and Announcements


Find the complete list of scheduled livestreams here.

The second livestream is tomorrow with Paige Bailey and special guests:Andre Araujo, Patricia Florissi, Alan Li, Anant Nawalgaria, Xiaoqi Ren,Chuck Sugnet and Howard Zhou.
Be sure to ask all your questions about the podcast, readings, and code labin the #5dgai-question-forum channel on Discord. You'll get Kaggle swag ifyour question is chosen for discussion during the livestream.

Happy learning and see you tomorrow!

The Kaggle Team








Google

[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/cvbbxb44dd/4.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gerth1tjm]HEY FRIEND! [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/67572311a573d5067e117cf2/art-ORWRl2CGcV-8eb97646-e27c-44fa-82dd-7c176c54c5b6.png]
We hope you're having a great week. Our friends in NYC had a blast at their
meetup. The year is nearly over, but there are still plenty of events happening
soon!Check out these upcoming meetups or find one near you on our AI Film Events
page
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0geva0d6tn]
:Dec 17 - AtlantaDec 19 - Baton RougeOk, let's get to the good stuff. We know
you're very, very excited for one major update this week‚Ä¶Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/rpuxyo4gei/Newsletter_Email_Images.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gevbp01a7]
SORA TUTORIAL VIDEO
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/67572311a573d5067e117cf2/art-KdmoWEEaTK-1f83e979-a227-46d5-a1cc-4a378821357f.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gew92arvn]
Well, the wait is over!OpenAI has granted US-based ChatGPT plus and pro
subscribers access to their highly, highly anticipated video generator SORA!
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gez51gm49]
ü§ØAfter being leaked by artists in the early access program just a few weeks
ago, SORA has had a bumpy ride! But for AI Filmmakers, Christmas came early this
year.Today we created this special tutorial
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gf1bk608p] 
 on how to use SORA, comparing it to Runway, Kling, Minimax and Luma. Learn all
the ins & outs of the platform, and how you can generate videos up to 1080p
resolution, up to 20 sec long, in widescreen, vertical or square aspect ratios.
To try it out, go to sora.com
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gf215exvy] 
and log in with your ChatGPT account info. Traffic is pretty high, so OpenAI is
releasing access to users on a rolling basis!Share your SORA creations and tag
us! We'd love to see what you create.Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/b4uv6gd6e2/8.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gf3e5f1h7]
Want to hear us dive even deeper into the biggest AI Film News stories of the
week? We just launched the AI Film News Podcast
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gf5ga2gr7]
, hosted by Jagger, who researches the webshow each week. We'll be back with a
new AI Film News episode this Friday!üé• Hunyuan Video Generator -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gf8s0h9zg] 
Tencent just released Hunyuan Video, a free and open-source AI video generator, 
strategically dropped during OpenAI's 12-day announcement campaign. The results
are hyper realistic, and you can test it out on fal.ai now.üëÄ Runway Act One
Video Performance -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gfc63ajp6]
Runway's facial performance capture features can now be used to change existing
videos! This basically lets you ‚Äúedit‚Äù acting performances by simply capturing a
new facial reaction. It works for singing, too!üéµ Spotify Wrapped Major Fail -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gferpxzzh] 
Spotify users felt let down by this year's ‚ÄúWrapped‚Äù after an awkward release.
But one fun highlight is that you can hear two AI ‚Äúpodcast hosts‚Äù created with 
NotebookLM chatting about your year in music. And they're very opinionated!üß†
Google DeepMind Genie 2 -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jesj893ej0jqta0gepd49mp4/01jesj893ej0jqta0gfj7jc3a2] 
Genie 2 is an intelligent, foundation world model capable of generating an
endless variety of action-controllable, playable 3D environments. Based on a
single prompt image, it can be played by a human or AI agent using keyboard and
mouse inputs.

:West Palm Beach - Dec 5Berlin - Dec 6NYC - Dec 8Ok, let's get to the good
stuff.Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/bf0vvspp70/10.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnzw6bta6]
ENROLLMENT CLOSES TOMORROW
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-KdmoWEEaTK-d038f914-c3e2-4e2f-a848-8bc3961141ed.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnzy65nve]Block 13th - countdown [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/countdown/32e50749-038f-40dc-ae32-58a6e63a880e/QVRYbU5SV2ZWRmFaQ2I3MElPUXFOUTZo.gif]
Just sharing a quick reminder that enrollment closes tomorrow at 11AM Pacific!
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsp2bn70g1]
This is your last 24 hours to take advantage of our Black Friday sale
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsp5wcjzq0] 
 and save $100 on any course. Just use code BF24 at checkout. üòâIf you've ever
wanted to make your own animated short, our AI Animation
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsp6092q1a] 
course created in partnership with Storybook Studios is perfect for you! You can
also learn how to enhance unscripted material with AI Documentary
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsp81wvba6]
, or expand your knowledge of marketing and supercharge your portfolio with AI
Advertising
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsp833fybx]
. As always, AI Filmmaking
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspaw7j154] 
will give you an in-depth education about all the AI tools for video production,
and you'll walk away with your very own short film by the end of the course.
Can't choose between all our wonderful courses? Save big on 3 courses of your
choice by grabbing a Course Bundle
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspdeyy7vc]
. (And yes, you can use the Black Friday code on bundles too!)This is our only
sale of the year, so we definitely recommend joining the courses now!CHECK OUT
THE COURSES
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspedwvj06]
Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/bg8zgqq1cv/6.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspf82sedf]
Last week we didn't drop a new AI Film News video, instead we created this 
Character Consistency Tutorial
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsphdbbye6] 
 for anyone looking for tips to make characters more visually consistent. We
hope you check it out!We'll be back with our weekly AI Film News video on
YouTube this Friday! Here's the top stories for AI filmmakers this week.üîé How
Did SORA Get Leaked? -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspmxf8t4j] 
 Last week, artists granted early access to SORA accused OpenAI
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspqhhw0db] 
of exploiting their feedback and R&D for free without fair compensation. The
leak was found through a project the artists allegedly published on the AI dev
platform Hugging Face.‚úçÔ∏è 139,000 Scripts Used To Train AI -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsptzrphm7]
The Atlantic discovered over 100k TV & film scripts in a data set being used to
train AI.
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcspwc8s9s3] 
Interestingly, the training data wasn't from uploaded scripts, but actually 
subtitles from those episodes and movies, sourced from a public site called
OpenSubtitles.org.üòÆ Luma ‚ÄúPhoton‚Äù Image Generator -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsq0b02vhp]
Go to the ‚Äúideas‚Äù tab in Dream Machine
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsq2nxtym0] 
to try this new image generator from Luma. You can now upload character
references and styles, and the new feature even allows multi-image uploads.üíª
Runway's New Keyframing Prototype -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsq6egqgzc] 
Runway announced an early video keyframing prototype that could help filmmakers 
keyframe multiple images
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqa9zykn7] 
together, hinting at a future release of a similar tool. Being able to upload
many keyframes for a single, continuous generation would blow our minds!

Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/yolfs962xt/11.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqb0kpvq6]CREATIVE AI JOBS BOARD [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-3MdFc79YGK-22b2fda5-d2bc-49da-a152-b8aa1a617e02.png]
Your next paid AI gig is closer than you think! We curate new jobs for you on
our Creative AI jobs board
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqd3eq65w] 
 every week. üëèAI filmmaking skills are in demand right now. We found several
different companies hiring AI Artist roles at this time, ranging from image
generation to video editing.And if you're hiring an AI Creative or other AI
positions, submit your job posting here!
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqg3eh2nx]
Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/vow5bklb50/7.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqhz7ktdp]AI FILM OF THE WEEK:ASTARIS / NEW REALITY [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-FGpkZvA1La-5ebeb116-4f95-40ce-ba93-19c08bad5edb.png]
Virtual dreams turn dangerous in this fantastic AI short film
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqnc15ryn] 
by Raul Perez Fullea (@fvll3a). When an evil corporation creates the ultimate VR
experience, the line between fantasy and reality begins to blur.MORE AI FILMS [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-YuGwOkBYZc-9fb234ea-8df7-4f99-818f-8bd67951fdbf.png] 
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqpajry9y] 
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsnq0sf4mg/01je6tym5d7hpg4mcsqrj2yecd]Block 37th [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-TIchSNcl2L-a14e50bb-1d5b-4d64-a926-b0b18c2bf211.png]

Block 40th [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-x0Izc2kjmT-9af83bf9-9817-4e0f-9e54-209bab7b7b1c.png]

Calling all Curious Refuge alumni! Before you go‚Ä¶ we have a super quick favor to
ask. üòäIf taking our AI filmmaking courses has made an impact on your career or
creative journey, we'd love to share your story and promote your AI project from
the course!Your perspective could inspire others to take the leap with their
creative dreams. If you're interested, please connect with our TA Stacey via
Discord DM or email hello@curiousrefuge.com.And if you have any questions at
all, just reply to this email. We will be happy to help! See you soon. ‚úåÔ∏èCaleb + Shelby [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/674defa6431f8fb2d43f7b97/art-95t9ko5sbg-72b52f81-c9fd-4e97-87aa-2d65a3b23095.png]

Subject: Updates to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Body Text:
HeyGen ( https://www.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )HeyGen ( https://www.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio ) Hi there,

You're receiving this email because we've made some important updates to our Terms of Service ( https://www.heygen.com/terms?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio ) and Privacy Policy ( https://www.heygen.com/policy?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio ).

HeyGen is committed to the safety and privacy of your data. We've update these documents to comply with the EU-US Data Privacy Framework. This includes important updates to the following sections of our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy:

*
The privacy policy is applicable to our recently launched mobile app.
* The certification for and registry in the EU-US Data Privacy Framework as a relevant mechanism for the personal data transfers to the United States.
* Greater clarification of legal bases for processing and purposes of processing.
* An introduction to third-party and alternative dispute resolution mechanisms regarding processing of personal data.
* More information about Data Protection Officer.
* And finally, information about relevant data protection authorities in the EU, UK and Switzerland.

LEARN MORE HERE ( https://www.heygen.com/terms?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )
This information is provided to you to account for how we process data and to be transparent in our relationship with you. We value the trust you bestow on us when we process your data.

Have a great day!

HeyGen ( https://app.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )

YouTube ( https://www.youtube.com/@heygen_official?utm_campaign=GDPR+remainders&utm_content=GDPR+remainders&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )

We‚Äôre writing to remind you of our new fee structure that will begin rolling out on Monday (1/6/25). The new fee structure will automatically apply to new and updated listings starting next week. It may take up to one week for the new fee structure to apply to all listings.

What you need to know if you purchase or sell an item between January 6 and January 12, 2025: --> *Other standard fees may apply including taxes, payment processing fees (2.9% +$0.50) and shipping costs. What is the new fee structure? Sellers pay a flat 10% selling fee on item price and buyer-paid shipping Buyers pay a flat 3.6% Buyer Protection fee on item price and buyer-paid shipping Free ACH direct deposits for successful withdrawals. A $2 fee applies only for rejected deposits. Limit to one direct deposit per day. Buyer Protection includes: A cancelation and refund policy, returns on eligible items, trusted transactions and 24/7 customer support No additional payment processing fee For more information, see our full statement

Subject: üí∞ Get paid to write
Body Text:
Quick trivia question:

What do all of these legendary writers have in common?

* Ian Fleming
* James Patterson
* Margaret Atwood

Yes, they‚Äôre all best-selling authors‚Ä¶

But the answer I‚Äôm looking for is:

They all started out as ghostwriters!
-------------------------------------

So it‚Äôs no surprise that these writers became wildly successful.

Ghostwriting is how you accelerate your writing skills, faster
than you would writing by yourself:

* You learn how to write in different voices
* You have a constant supply of topics to write about
* You get feedback on your writing from smart people (your
clients!)

You get paid to write all day, every day.

Now, here‚Äôs a brutal truth:

You won‚Äôt be able to quit for 9 to 5 on Day 1 of ghostwriting.

But if you want to start landing clients and charging more for
your writing faster‚Ä¶
-----------------------------------------------------------------

You need to get mentored by someone who‚Äôs done exactly what
you‚Äôre trying to do.

You have to invest in yourself so you don‚Äôt spend years making
the same mistakes I did.

(I quit my ad agency job at 26, and I had no plan how I‚Äôd land
clients‚Äîhorrible decision!)

So, are you serious about starting a ghostwriting side hustle?

Then I‚Äôd love to be your mentor!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

)‚Äã
-----------------------------------------------------------------

I can‚Äôt wait to help you get started.

Nicolas Cole

Co-Founder, Premium Ghostwriting Academy

PS‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúBut Cole‚Ä¶can I really replace my income?‚Äù

Jack here might be an outlier, but he wrapped up October with
this amazing win.

(Yes, ghostwriting really can be this lucrative!)

üéâ Quick thing before we start - after over a year of work, and 3
iterations of running it live to 1,000+ people with feedback and
improvements each time, we‚Äôve finally released my new online
course, LifeOS (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/75up528qe9b8h664rr3hzhwx48666sn/3ohphdu7w8xr7xup/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL2xpZmVvcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249MTlGZWJfdG9wbGluZSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlmZW5vdGVz
). It‚Äôs a self-paced productivity course that teaches you how to
build your own Life Operating System to help you take consistent
action towards your goals. If you‚Äôd like to check it out, here‚Äôs
a link (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/75up528qe9b8h664rr3hzhwx48666sn/3ohphdu7w8xr7xup/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL2xpZmVvcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249MTlGZWJfdG9wbGluZSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlmZW5vdGVz
).

Anyway, this week I wanted to share a concept from Oliver
Burkeman‚Äôs Meditations for Mortals (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/75up528qe9b8h664rr3hzhwx48666sn/wnh2h6uwzdm4w6sl/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5pLnVzL21lZGl0YXRpb25zZm9ybW9ydGFscw==
) that I read a few weeks ago which really resonated. Here‚Äôs the
quote from chapter 15:

The New Age author Julia Rogers Hamrick once wrote a book,
Choosing Easy World, in which she argues it‚Äôs as simple as
repeating a mantra: ‚ÄòI choose to live in Easy World, where
everything is easy.‚Äô When some daunting challenge barrels into
view, just decide that you‚Äôre going to experience it as easy
instead. I realise that sounds like the worst kind of denial of
human limitation, as if you could get your way merely by
commanding the universe to fall in line with your desires. In
fact, though, it can be surprisingly effective ‚Äì because it
functions not as a mystical command to the universe but as a
reminder to yourself not to fall into the old habit of adding
complications or feelings of unpleasant exertion where neither
need exist.
I haven‚Äôt read Hamrick‚Äôs Choosing Easy World yet - just bought it
on Kindle. But that mantra that Burkeman quotes ‚ÄúI choose to live
in Easy World, where everything is easy‚Äù has been living
rent-free in my head for the past few weeks, in a surprisingly
helpful way.

I choose to live in Easy World, where everything is easy.
Over the past couple of weeks, I‚Äôve found myself noticing various
instances where reminding myself of the mantra has helped. Some
examples

* I‚Äôm working on a new YouTube video and the usual thoughts come
up: ‚Äúargh this content isn‚Äôt good enough, it needs more prep, it
needs more science backing it up, argh it‚Äôs repetitive, I already
made a video about this 4 years ago argh‚Äù. Instead of letting
those make the process feel effortful and ‚Äúhard‚Äù, I remind
myself: ‚ÄúI choose to live in Easy World, where everything is
easy‚Äù. Suddenly, the pressure eases a bit, and I can approach the
video with a lighter heart.
* I wake up in the morning on a weekend, see that it‚Äôs 8:30am,
and think ‚Äúargh I‚Äôm still tired, I want to sleep for an extra
hour, but if I do it‚Äôll be 9:30am, and I won‚Äôt get started with
getting stuff done until like 10am, and there‚Äôs so much to do and
not enough time to do it‚Ä¶..‚Äù. In that moment (which has happened
on a handful of days in the past few weeks), I remind myself: ‚ÄúI
choose to live in Easy World where everything is easy.‚Äù In that
world, would I feel bad about getting an extra hour of sleep? Nah
probably not. Let‚Äôs go back to sleep, and maintain the 100% sleep
score.
* I‚Äôm rushing from the gym back home, slightly panicking about
being late, feeling the tension of the lift taking ages to come
down. In that moment, I think: ‚Äúoh yeah, I live in Easy World
where everything is easy‚Äù. It helps me relax, and realise that I
can‚Äôt do much about the lift being slow, and being a few minutes
late to the meeting isn‚Äôt that big a deal, so I may as well take
a breath, enjoy the scenery and chill out about it.

The phrase reminds me of Tim Ferriss‚Äôs journaling prompt: ‚ÄúWhat
would this look like if it were easy?‚Äù which I‚Äôve gotten a lot of
value out of over the years. It‚Äôs somewhat similar to the idea I
write about in Feel-Good Productivity (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/75up528qe9b8h664rr3hzhwx48666sn/8ghqh3ul48w3lmtl/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5mZWVsZ29vZHByb2R1Y3Rpdml0eS5jb20vbGlmZW5vdGVz
) too: ‚ÄúWhat would this look like if it were fun?‚Äù

There‚Äôs something about choosing to live in an easy world that
feels particularly freeing. It‚Äôs a reminder that we don‚Äôt have to
make things harder than they need to be, a theme that Burkeman
talks about a lot in Meditations for Mortals and 4,000 Weeks (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/75up528qe9b8h664rr3hzhwx48666sn/m2h7h6u8rx298xfl/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5pLnVzL3I3ZzJV
) too.

So, here‚Äôs a thought experiment for you: What would change about
your life if, just for this week, you decided to adopt this
mindset? Next time you‚Äôre struggling with something, try saying
to yourself, I choose to live in easy world where everything is
easy. How might that change your approach? Would it help you to
let go of some of the stress and pressure?

It‚Äôs worth caveating, of course, that your problems are unlikely
to magically disappear by just asking yourself this question. But
like me, I wonder if you might find that it helps you let go,
just a little bit, of the unnecessary extra angst, stress and
suffering, we add on top of whatever ‚Äúproblem‚Äù we need to solve.

Have a great week!

Ali xx

Subject: Our free, hands-on data science courses
Body Text:
Kaggle





Hi Candace Grant,

Are you here to learn data science or improve your current skills? Ourhands-on courses are the fastest path to a data science career. In only afew hours, you'll gain practical skills that you can immediately apply toKaggle competitions, or your own data science projects.





Check out our courses



Whether you're completely new to Python or an expert looking for advancedtechniques to improve your machine learning models, you're in the rightplace!

Happy learning,

The Kaggle Team



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to aicoaching2025@gmail.com because you indicated thatyou'd like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want toreceive these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can alsochange your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in atkaggle.com.

Well, the race continues between AI video generators! And it's only going to get
crazier in 2025.SORA and VEO 2 are already making waves as the hottest new tools
of the year. But which AI video generators

know in the comments which AI video generator you think is the best.CHECK OUT

We release new AI Film News
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8k5zm9gj] 
episodes each week. This week are getting ready to launch the very first AI Film
News Episode of 2025! woot. Here are the top stories this week for AI
Filmmakers.üíé Upscale Video to 4K in Runway -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8kbdhb4b] 
It's now super easy to upscale your video generations in Runway with just one
click. After generating, hit the bottom left button that says ‚ÄúActions‚Äù and
you'll be upscaling in no time.üôã Whose Job Is It Anyway? -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8kjmnerb]
The World Economic Forum just released its 2025 Future of Jobs Report. 70% of
employers plan to hire new staff with AI experience. Sounds like a great excuse
to educate yourself on all the latest tools!üíÑ
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8mc3285d]
AI Facelifts for Video Footage -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8mxntxfa] 
SVFR can restore high-quality video faces from low-quality inputs by combining
video face restoration, inpainting, and colorization to improve the overall
quality.‚õìÔ∏è Breaking Moore's Law -
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8rkk1hv0] 
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said that Nvidia's AI chips are advancing at a pace that
surpasses Moore's Law, a prediction that the number of transistors on a chip
would only double every 2 years. Cool!

Image item
[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/poujezfjov/6.png]

Creative AI jobs board
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8wh4tc44]
.An online language educator is looking for an AI Artist, CantoAI is seeking a

positions, submit your job posting here!
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y8z7kfk0x]

[https://usercontent.flodesk.com/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/upload/m151ag2epk/9.png]
[https://uqj77c.ff12.fdske.com/e/c/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y80trsyyx/01jhjnvbfhy4ayb66y92vqk53m]AI FILM OF THE WEEK:NEWTON'S CRADLE [https://usercontent.flodesk.com/screenshots/58aed3ae-6715-4ca4-80fb-7d8e73c69e7d/678542bd0a21730ccf8de605/art-FGpkZvA1La-0583caff-25bb-452c-8b3c-7bcaf869a81e.png]
Time becomes a deadly currency in this fantastic AI short film by Jeff
Synthesized (@JeffSynthesized). "Newton's Cradle"

Subject: Candace Grant, Your interest in the Professional Certificate in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence¬†online from UC Berkeley Executive Education
Body Text:
Thank You Dear Candace Grant, I hope this email finds you well. My name is Harleen Walia and I‚Äôm a Program Advisor for the Professional Certificate in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence¬†online. I tried calling you today about your interest in the program but couldn't get through. If you have any questions or need assistance regarding the program, please feel free to contact me directly by replying to this email. You can also https://click.info.emeritus.org/?qs=b5abf826a691cad7291e8930ba19373bd0fe576b630bb83aebcad742a62b26e678236bef7ca084aee9556764d1d6672b48eac2047a84caa0c19f163f486fe17c schedule an appointment with me at a time that works best for you. A few details of the Program: Schedule: - The program starts on November 6, 2025 - 1 live session per week (Mon or Fri) - 15‚Äì20 hours a week - 6 months Finance: - Tuition is USD 7,900 - Apply before the deadline October 9, 2025, to get 11% early registration benefit on the program fee - Contact me to receive an additional USD 100 tuition assistance on the program fee if you apply now - Reimbursement Link https://click.info.emeritus.org/?qs=b5abf826a691cad7d7b38db50d59f094aedf2a8263e121c043501cce737020d32c98554b01b3f04fdaa4f1121e57b4799edc9198bbc642e0258ec86d40233d88 Click here For more details you can download the https://click.info.emeritus.org/?qs=b5abf826a691cad78ab70a518703d9b9ce813bb897f0bfee9ae7932f4a5ca8cce073cc21a96a873f719f1528b4743c1be722abe0def48308ac366ed486c7ff4f brochure . I‚Äôll be your Program Advisor during this process so if you have any additional questions, please let me know. I‚Äôm here to help! When you‚Äôre ready, use this link to https://click.info.emeritus.org/?qs=b5abf826a691cad74d25ccbbcf4eed64851bc6539ac41d537ec8157eeef0f9b2139410f8ad6ca9708ee69ca39c5ab59d933f1b1076da79af2e3effb4880dfc7b Apply Now . Refer a Friend to the Professional Certificate in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence¬†online and receive a rebate of USD 500 on the program fee. https://click.info.emeritus.org/?qs=b5abf826a691cad7591e5d42e219914c6ced1aa20e5395f1a8a63e5ffadb560ae6abb18f7f527401d865fb8824933a08ae4f1b440a93eb67eb69d0da07ed197c Click Here to learn more about the referral benefit and invite your colleagues/friends to join this program. Best Regards Harleen Walia Program Advisor

Subject: üëÄ The Problem with "Finding Your Purpose"
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

Hope you‚Äôre doing well ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Alongside finalising the curriculum content for our $1K Challenge
(
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/qvhmxm2mt8ud62em53sg/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3RoZS0xay1jaGFsbGVuZ2UvP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1wdXJwb3NlXzI4JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1wcm9kdWN0aXZlbm90ZXM=
) that‚Äôs starting in a few days (you can still sign up here (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/g3h737pkfwumzog852u3/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3RoZS0xay1jaGFsbGVuZ2UvP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1wdXJwb3NlXzI4JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1wcm9kdWN0aXZlbm90ZXM=
) if you‚Äôre interested), I‚Äôve been doing quite a bit of thinking
about something that I know loads of us struggle with - this
whole question of ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs my purpose?‚Äù

Over the last 200 years or so, no one really cared too much about
this stuff. But in the last 20 years, suddenly everyone‚Äôs
obsessed with trying to find their big ‚Äúpurpose‚Äù in life and back
when I read Anne-Laure‚Äôs book, Tiny Experiments (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/48hvh7um2qwddzfq/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5pLnVzL3RpbnlleHBlcmltZW50cw==
), there‚Äôs this graph that basically shows just how dramatic this
shift‚Äôs been:

‚Äã
One of the key arguments Anne makes in the book is that this idea
of ‚Äúfinding your purpose‚Äù came about as a way to reject
traditional career path thinking. We thought it would give us
more freedom and control over our lives because we‚Äôre doing all
this soul-searching and asking ourselves these big existential
questions and stuff, but in reality, setting yourself the goal of
‚Äúfinding my one true purpose‚Äù can be just as restrictive as
locking yourself into the same career for like 50 years or
something.

Back when I spoke to Anne, I found myself really resonating with
this idea because in my own life, there‚Äôs this constant
underlying pressure to try and identify the one thing that I‚Äôm
supposedly meant to do for the rest of my life.

Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I‚Äôm a big fan of books like The ONE Thing (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/wnh2h6uqovm225fl/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5pLnVzLzJ1YkJwMWw=
) by Gary Keller and Essentialism (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/reh8h9um5vkll3c6/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5pLnVzLzdSMVZCcw==
) by Greg McKeown, where their message is basically that if you
can find that one true thing, then that‚Äôs what will get you out
of bed in the morning and help you feel motivated when motivation
inevitably dips. And there‚Äôs definitely truth to that.

But the problem is that we‚Äôve essentially turned ‚Äúpurpose‚Äù into a
single destination - a fixed endpoint that we need to reach,
after which everything will just magically make sense. And this
is a classic example of what psychologists call the ‚Äúarrival
fallacy,‚Äù which is the whole idea that once we arrive at a
particular destination, then we‚Äôll be happy.

So in this case, we say to ourselves stuff like ‚Äúonce I‚Äôve found
my purpose, then I‚Äôll be happy‚Äù and ‚Äúonce I‚Äôve found my purpose,
then I‚Äôll be doing the right thing.‚Äù

But one of the most liberating ideas that I got from the
conversation and from the book was that purpose isn‚Äôt something
you find once, like some treasure you dig up and then never have
to think about again. Instead, purpose is something we‚Äôre
continuously discovering and rediscovering as we go through life.
It evolves and changes and that‚Äôs completely normal.

So if you‚Äôve ever found yourself thinking ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs my passion?‚Äù
and struggled to find an answer, then hopefully this helps you
realise that maybe you‚Äôre not the problem. Maybe the real issue
lies in the definition of purpose that we‚Äôve somehow convinced
ourselves to believe - this idea that it has to be this singular,
unchanging, unifying thing that gives everything in your life
meaning.

What if instead of asking ‚Äúwhat is my life‚Äôs purpose?‚Äù we tried
asking: ‚Äúwhat gives my life meaning right now, in this season?‚Äù

I really like this idea of seasonality, and right now, what gives
my life meaning on the work front is continuing to make YouTube
videos that I think are genuinely helpful and building helpful,
productivity apps that I actually want to use every day (and that
hopefully millions of people can benefit from too).

Anyway, I hope you‚Äôve found this useful - finally, just a quick
reminder that there‚Äôs still a couple of days left to sign up to
The $1K Challenge (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/3ohphdu3d9x5l8ap/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3RoZS0xay1jaGFsbGVuZ2UvP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1wdXJwb3NlXzI4JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1wcm9kdWN0aXZlbm90ZXM=
) which starts on Friday (August 1st). If you missed my previous
emails, this is a 6-week programme running throughout the summer
to help you take your first steps on your path to financial
freedom. You can get more info here (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/3ohphdu3d9x5l8ap/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3RoZS0xay1jaGFsbGVuZ2UvP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1wdXJwb3NlXzI4JnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1wcm9kdWN0aXZlbm90ZXM=
) - enrolment closes on Thursday evening.

Let me know if reframing ‚Äúlife purpose‚Äù ‚Üí ‚Äúmeaning right now‚Äù
helps in dealing with those questions when they arise.

Have a great week!

Ali xx

Update Your Email Preferences (
https://unsubscribe.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6
) | Unsubscribe from ProductiveNotes (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/qdumn6rew9u7h48e9p9blh87pxrkkc4h8opl6/rehrr0e2h9um5vkll7s6/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3NvcnJ5LXRvLXNlZS15b3UtZ28_cHJvZHVjdGl2aXZ0eWxhYg==
) |

From: Candace Academics West
Sent: Wednesday, July 20, 2022 2:40 PM
To: Dr. K Academics West <drk@academicswest.com>; Jazzie Hernandez <jhernandez@academicswest.com>; Debbie Madden <debbiemadden2001@gmail.com>; Front Desk <frontdesk@academicswest.com>
Subject: Additional Printer Features -- Print reports of staff copies and total prints by all users


Hello Dr. K and team,


Create reports from the Printer/Copier

After login, click the following tabs/buttons in this order,

  1.  Maintenance
  2.  Import/Export
  3.  Meter Count
  4.  Export
  5.  Account Track Counter, leave Export to PC selected
  6.  OK
  7.  File Download
  8.  If you have Excel on your computer, then you can choose to. Open the file with Excel
  9.  If the file saves as a text document, follow these steps below to convert the text document to an Excel spreadsheet.

Convert from a text document to an Excel spreadsheet


  1.  Open the Excel spreadsheet where you want to save the data and click the Data tab.
  2.  In the Get Data(Power Query) group, click Get Data (Power Query).
  3.  For Choose Data Source, select Text/CSV
  4.  Upload the text version of the Printer/Copier Report

At this time,  reports can indicate the number of copies made per staff, but does not show an individual count of print jobs.  Reports should be printed once per month and compared with the reports from the previous month as the system does not reset values, but keeps a cumulative count of jobs processed.


Best,
Candace


Candace Grant (She, Her, Hers)

Subject: ü§ù The Importance of Connecting with Fellow Creators¬†
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

Hope you've had a great start to the week :)

Anyone else watch the Apple event yesterday? I always get sucked into the excitement of a new release even though I know the new phone will basically be the same as last year...but I'm a massive fan of Apple stuff (as you probably know by now üòÖ)

Anyway, I wanted to use this email today to talk about the importance of connection - more specifically why connecting with other creators or peers in the YouTube space can be a key part of growing a successful channel.

Let me explain.

Everyone knows, YouTube‚Äôs one of the biggest platforms in the world with new creators emerging every month, new channels appearing every week, and new videos going viral every day.

Even if you don‚Äôt have a channel, it‚Äôs pretty likely you use YouTube at least a few times a week (probably a few times every day if we‚Äôre being honest üëÄ).

And yet growing a channel can be a pretty lonely and isolating experience.

Friends and family might not really understand why you‚Äôre doing it - you might even avoid telling friends and family because you‚Äôre afraid of what they‚Äôd think.

Unless you know other creators, it can feel like you‚Äôre on your own.

‚ùå Nobody to ask for honest feedback on your videos.

‚ùå Nobody to speak to about CTR and AVD.

‚ùå Nobody to turn to for inspiration.

I felt like that too in the early stages of growing the channel üò¢

There were a couple of people at Cambridge who had channels but it was still pretty daunting recording and uploading that very first vlog and then walking around holding my camera and filming my university experience.

It wasn‚Äôt something every student was doing üòÖ

Luckily I was able to connect with some other creators in the same space but those first few years were hard.

And that‚Äôs the thing, YouTube‚Äôs not easy - doing it alone makes it even harder.

But making the effort to make connections is worth it.

I remember connecting with Thomas Frank (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWsW3j5tWLKrW3WkSPW83PxfsVDyhz95kQmmPMLtlVn3pyd0W7lCdLW6lZ3mfW6PKhl_95lS-5W2nCYQL3qNN-pW8NJgZ89hQXp1W2vfN5N2V9XVfVNbmVB7WfgtHW2BpJCN5gFk4mN6Jsjk7m_25tW1FHLl24tZMThW4mLw0Q5VltNHW5MX3Lg2VBRwfVBPy4m1b3_lWW3Lkmyx5LxfDxW65_XPq1cHqq8W4pQ7ky3pW0C4W9f5Pt-9k-gcgW2-c5Kw3Jxt1HW7XlzsG3s-F_RW4vTJ1Y6k2MWVW6BDTzn36d_n1W5YGpYn6dK354W5-WR0D6-S2JqW4fSVtj9k6C2zW5b6CZz7g-6cmN96bkcb7WXKPf1hnczW04 ) a couple of years into my journey and he suggested areas where I could improve my channel and my business and then if it wasn‚Äôt for a long chat with Tiago Forte (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWsW3j5tWLKrW3WkSPW83PxfsVDyhz95kQmmPMLtlV43pyd0W6N1vHY6lZ3kwW8Lh1gx5t8STdVByDvK5zsHP0W62v_Kx45cwQRW1H8-T11jQkT0N6GTtB1MpnyGW634Nl44DBfkVW2H-H0Y4ZwkCHW88SPCX34zxgrN7MNMFHzDrW7W4XRclj82tf_gW809x053_ghQ6W7pM-fR1-frbLVsxC7H7MKzWPW8QHS_T1_bRcDMWlLylSq90KW25GvPw1KDyqgW5rbc8D5xFgRGW68rdBS7wPn1rV1hM832x0BRzW74mKKB6yxzvHW2tGPcW4bcYtFW22BXQm1NnM_0f3KlxwT04 ) and David Perell (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWsW3j5tWLKrW3WkSPW83PxfsVDyhz95kQmmPMLtlV43pyd0W6N1vHY6lZ3nxW5bHbQt6Pd_GbW738F-j81xrShW3NSKf-4yfX-qW6wW3w98GnzCDW8wSmKM62xz3MVTsDr451Z2FVW4XfdJC5j_0TNW2F6rgv74mpN_W2x24cg4y_tfFVSj-Lj3rdW3FW8KGGG57jFVFzW7v-06_84h67GW6BF2-y6q3kNkV1ZH8L6M2CVSVL8BSj2s_HWlW4k3qgQ7Q4sV_W8PjKsV4Y1rZ_W27HXxv2g41x8W8Fwb-12-hzJzMZdrKdGPCBMW38kFwB4mY8QNW5ZWW2Y7vVPrgdlkL9K04 ) in summer 2020 after I'd connected with them on Twitter, I‚Äôd never have started the Part-Time YouTuber Academy.

So for me, starting a YouTube channel has completely changed my life in large part because of the people I‚Äôve met as a result of making the videos and reaching out to make connections.

In fact, my network‚Äôs far bigger than it ever would‚Äôve been had I not started a channel. But it‚Äôs only grown because I made the effort to talk to others in the space.

And this isn't about expanding your ‚Äònetwork‚Äô (I dislike that word as much as the next person üò¨).

It's the accountability and advice that these connections provide which is even more valuable. In fact, it's crucial when you're growing your channel - especially early on in your YouTube journey.

So if you‚Äôre in that position now where you‚Äôre missing accountability, or struggling with taking action or just lacking people to talk to about YouTube or creator-type things, I‚Äôd encourage you to seek those connections and try to find a group or community of fellow creators to help along the way.

One of the things that gets mentioned repeatedly by students who‚Äôve had success going through the Part-Time YouTuber Academy (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWsW3j5tWLKrW3WkSPW83PxfsVDyhz95kQmmPMLtlVn3pyd0W7lCdLW6lZ3l_W9f_Z0g3NYB5HW1sRHXp3JxnLZV1hwBl8hlD_JW10j0Kn2P5895W3Q6wSh2ffpBTW94zs7b8HdTtQW8xDfVj3BpgG_W6DfCMM7LmlDMW3y3qP36W00y9W9k0HLK14bg6HVHnppj1KF5y-VRm-Bh7g5q80W2TsQkv2Ddv1xW82j2pQ1cL9StW7Mg6D51Yz39hW265rXC3tBsfrW64k-Pz3xP4k8W6v2V_Q78gqRwVX9sbz1wdc06V96cLR1x4prBW7KcdvN79jd1tW7Bkh3J631wQcW1-_pRK7MbtvLW38w5Yd1Qr5RWf8cJb9b04 ) , is that the community provided that space to connect with like-minded individuals who ‚Äòget it‚Äô and could offer more relevant advice and provided accountability in the early stages.

Of course, I‚Äôm not going to pretend that the PTYA Community is the only place where you can connect with other creators but if you join the Part-Time YouTuber Academy (https://djX7c204.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/5H+113/djX7c204/VWsW3j5tWLKrW3WkSPW83PxfsVDyhz95kQmmPMLtlVn3pyd0W7lCdLW6lZ3l_W9f_Z0g3NYB5HW1sRHXp3JxnLZV1hwBl8hlD_JW10j0Kn2P5895W3Q6wSh2ffpBTW94zs7b8HdTtQW8xDfVj3BpgG_W6DfCMM7LmlDMW3y3qP36W00y9W9k0HLK14bg6HVHnppj1KF5y-VRm-Bh7g5q80W2TsQkv2Ddv1xW82j2pQ1cL9StW7Mg6D51Yz39hW265rXC3tBsfrW64k-Pz3xP4k8W6v2V_Q78gqRwVX9sbz1wdc06V96cLR1x4prBW7KcdvN79jd1tW7Bkh3J631wQcW1-_pRK7MbtvLW38w5Yd1Qr5RWf8cJb9b04 ) you‚Äôll get lifetime access to those spaces that we've created specifically to facilitate those discussions and connections.

As always, zero pressure and if you‚Äôve got any questions about YouTube then you can always just email support@ptya.com (mailto:support@ptya.com) to get some free advice and support.

Have a great week ahead :)

Ali xx

Ali Abdaal Ltd, 16-19 Eastcastle Street, Fitzrovia, London W1W 8DY, United Kingdom

Subject: [Welcome + Setup Instructions] 5-Day Gen AI Intensive
Body Text:
Kaggle


Hello Candace,

Welcome to our 5-Day Gen AI Intensive Course with Google! We're glad you'rehere.

This email includes a brief summary of how the course works andinstructions on how to get set up. Tomorrow you'll receive your firstassignment.

How the Course Works


Everyday, you'll receive an email with assignments including the latestversions of all whitepapers, codelabs and podcast episodes.
While completing the assignments, you'll be able to ask questions anddiscuss with other participants on our Discord channel. The channel will bemonitored by several Google ML researchers and engineers who can answerquestions.
Everyday, Paige Bailey will host a YouTube livestream at 11 AM PT / 7 PMCET / 11:30 PM IST starting on Monday, March 31st. She'll be joined byspecial guests from Google.
Throughout the event week, please make sure to complete all course content,including the codelabs, whitepapers, and podcast episodes.
On the final day of the event, we will launch the capstone project, whichwill allow you to apply the knowledge you've gained throughout the course.By participating in the capstone project, you will earn a badge and acertificate on Kaggle.

Setup Instructions


Sign up for a Kaggle account and learn how Notebooks work. Make sure tophone verify your account, it's necessary for the course's codelabs.
Sign up for an AI Studio account and ensure you can generate an API key.
We also have a troubleshooting guide for the codelabs. Be sure to checkthere for solutions to common problems.
Sign up for a Discord account and join us on the Kaggle Discord server. Wehave the following channels dedicated to this event:


#5dgai-announcements: find official course announcements and livestreamrecordings.
#5dgai-introductions: introduce yourself and meet other participants fromaround the world.
#5dgai-question-forum: Discord forum-style channel for asking questions anddiscussions about the assignments.
#5dgai-general-chat: a general channel to discuss course materials andnetwork with other participants.

Please note that if you would like to post on other channels on the Kagglediscord you will need to link your Kaggle account to discord here:https://kaggle.com/discord/confirmation.

Once you've got everything set up, please introduce yourself in the#5dgai-introductions channel on Discord. We are looking forward to meetingyou!

See you soon,

The Kaggle Team








Google

¬© 2025 Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043


This email has been sent to aicoaching2025@gmail.com. If you no longer wishto receive emails about this event, please unsubscribe here.

Subject: ‚õµÔ∏è A Reminder To Enjoy The Journey
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

Hope you‚Äôve had a good start to the week :)

I had a few people reply to my email last week resonating with
the difficulty around getting back into the flow of filming at
the start of the year - trust me, it‚Äôs something we all struggle
with, regardless of the size of the channel üòÖ

But it is something I‚Äôve been thinking about quite a bit this
week too, or more specifically, remembering why it‚Äôs important to
find joy in the process.

If you‚Äôve followed my content for a while, you‚Äôll know I‚Äôm a big
fan of journey before destination as a framework for thinking
about everything really - it‚Äôs such a succinct but powerful way
of illustrating the relative importance of focussing on the
process, rather than fixating on the outcome.

And even though it‚Äôs ‚Äònice‚Äô to see a 1 out of 10 on a video (like
we did today), that's an outcome and I know that‚Äôs not a
sustainable way of really getting joy from the process of
creating videos. After all, if you‚Äôre not enjoying it, you‚Äôre
going to struggle to create content consistently.

It reminds me of a question from one of the experiments in my
book which is ‚Äòwhat would this look like if it were fun?‚Äô

In the book I‚Äôm not talking about YouTube and it might seem
strange to bring it up because, in theory, it shouldn‚Äôt really
apply here where we're choosing to create content and so it
should be something that we enjoy.

But that doesn‚Äôt mean that there aren‚Äôt parts of the video
production process that you simply find difficult, dull or boring
or perhaps moments along your YouTube journey where you‚Äôre just
struggling to find the motivation, like I was last week üëÄ. And
it‚Äôs in those moments where asking the question of ‚Äòwhat would
this look like if it were fun?‚Äô can still be immensely helpful.

And I actually asked myself a variation of this when I was
setting my target for the channel that I mentioned last week
(getting back to 2 videos per week on a consistent basis).
Essentially, what would make this easier, more enjoyable and, as
a result, more likely to happen? üòÖ

For me, the solution I settled on was reintroducing a weekly
(rather than monthly) YouTube idea generation session with 2-3
team members which we‚Äôd dropped last year but which we‚Äôve
reinstated at the start of January and so far the results have
been great. The sessions have been creative, effective and, above
all, fun.

In fact, the video released earlier today (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/p9ugxvrl5nb9h2376g4hqhpz49033hr/qvh8h8ur3w5leoag/aHR0cHM6Ly95b3V0dS5iZS9VN0pOZE1iajF6TT9zaT0wdkFwQmFRSTJhbzEydHBW
) was actually the first one to come out of those ideation
sessions and it was a 1 out of 10 immediately so the process is
clearly working - not just with helping me stay consistent but
also with creating better videos.

So I‚Äôd encourage you to think about ways that you can make each
part of the video production process more enjoyable. Perhaps
you‚Äôre like me and you enjoy working with others or you get more
joy from gamifying the process - whatever it is, just remember to
keep it front of mind if you‚Äôre struggling with motivating
yourself to start or grow your channel as we kickstart 2025.

Hope this has helped and have a great rest of the week :)

Ali xx

üöÄ Want to start a YouTube channel? Go here (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/p9ugxvrl5nb9h2376g4hqhpz49033hr/g3hnhwu32950gpb3/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5wdHlhLmNvbS9wdHlhLWJsLWZvb3Rlcg==
).
