Subject: Break 8 faulty beliefs to get rich
Body Text:
Hey there!

Inside our Premium Ghostwriting Academy, we have writers earning:

* $10k/month.
* $20k/month.
* Even $50k/month.

But they were only able to hit these awesome numbers by fixing 8
common faulty beliefs all writers suffer from at some point in
their careers.

So, if you‚Äôre looking to earn more as a ghostwriter, let‚Äôs get to
work breaking the limiting beliefs holding you.

Prefer to watch a version of this email on YouTube?

Then check out this video:

(
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/z2hgh7u3qx4llouz/aHR0cHM6Ly95b3V0dS5iZS9EbktEd3k1TnVTMD9zaT0zS1pIN0U3NzFnRVQzckNx
)‚Äã

**************************************************
Faulty Belief #1: ‚ÄúNobody can afford my services.‚Äù
**************************************************

I promise you there are millions of people in the world who can
afford your services‚Äîyou just haven‚Äôt found them yet.

But here‚Äôs the brutal reason why you believe no one can afford
your services:

You think what you‚Äôre selling is a lot of money.

It doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs $3,000, $4,000, or $5,000‚Äîif someone
says, ‚ÄúThis is too expensive!‚Äù you immediately agree with them
because you secretly think it yourself.

This faulty belief is keeping you stuck and keeps you in a
vicious cycle of:

* Switching niches.
* Changing your offer.
* Not facing any skill deficiency that‚Äôs limiting outcomes for
your clients.

Nicolas Cole üö¢-->

@Nicolascole77

If you aren't earning $100,000+ per year as a writer, chances are
you're making the following mistakes:

1. No niche
2. No packaged service
3. No premium pricing tier
4. No naming & claiming what makes you different

Do those 4 things and people will throw money at you. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/x0hph3uw50rqqeig/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODUxNzMwOTk1NTM3MzkyMDY4
)
2:0 PM ‚Ä¢ Oct 30, 2024

4
Retweets
88
Likes

Read 24 replies (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/x0hph3uw50rqqeig/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODUxNzMwOTk1NTM3MzkyMDY4
)
‚Äã
So, fix this faulty belief (and these other 7) first before doing
any of the above.

****************************************
Faulty Belief #2: ‚ÄúI need more clients.‚Äù
****************************************

No, you need the same number of clients or fewer clients to pay
you more money.

I lived this mistake for years building my ghostwriting agency.
Our original offer was 3 articles per week (so 12 per month) for
$3,000. So this meant we were getting paid $250 per article.

And it took us 2 years to learn and realize 2 important realities
about our offer:

* This was too much volume for the client (they couldn‚Äôt keep up
with the calls & the review process).
‚Äã
* They would have been happy to pay us more to publish less so
that the service didn‚Äôt require as much of their time.

So, after 2 years, we changed our offer to 2 articles per month
for $5,000.

This was a 10x increase in price for a tenth of the amount of
work. And clients were still happy to pay us for our services!

So if you‚Äôre looking to scale from $5k / month to $10k or $15k
per month, the game isn‚Äôt more clients. The trick is to get your
current clients to pay you more and all new clients to pay you
for your newly priced offer.

***************************************************************
Faulty Belief #3: ‚ÄúI‚Äôll charge more when I‚Äôm more experienced.‚Äù
***************************************************************

When ghostwriters tell me this, I always ask:

What does ‚Äúmore experienced‚Äù mean for you?

Does it mean:

* Working with 3 clients?
* Consistently earning $10k/month?
* Once you‚Äôve read 10 books on writing?

They can never give me a specific metric of what it means to be
more ‚Äúexperienced.‚Äù And even if they do, spoiler alert, once they
hit that milestone, they‚Äôll still feel inexperienced.

The real issue they‚Äôre avoiding is why they don‚Äôt think they
deserve to charge more‚Ä¶ TODAY.

I‚Äôve mentored 1,000+ ghostwriters at this point and without fail
100% of the time the root issue here has nothing to do with
experience level or how many clients they‚Äôve worked with.
Instead, it all comes down to their relationship with money.

They‚Äôre intimidated by charging more because:

* They‚Äôve never done it before.
* Or they tried once and a client pushed back, saying it was too
expensive.
* Or they are still struggling financially themselves so they
can‚Äôt fathom them asking a client to pay what they charge because
they only have $200 in their checking account.

I get it. I‚Äôve had to work through all of these same issues
myself and I can‚Äôt tell you how many writers I‚Äôve coached out of
these same faulty beliefs.

Nicolas Cole üö¢-->

@Nicolascole77

After mentoring thousands of smart, curious, creative writers,
I've learned the thing that holds so many people back isn't a
lack of skill or ability to learn. It's a lack of belief in
themselves. It's not that they can't. It's that they don't
*think* they can. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/kkhmh2ulkvdxxmck/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODIwNDE0NjIzMzE0NDg5ODAw
)
4:0 AM ‚Ä¢ Aug 5, 2024

13
Retweets
224
Likes

Read 56 replies (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/kkhmh2ulkvdxxmck/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODIwNDE0NjIzMzE0NDg5ODAw
)
‚Äã
This is why having a mentor, joining a community, or taking a
program (or having all 3, like inside my Premium Ghostwriting
Academy (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/z2hgh7u3qx4llnbz/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJlbWl1bWdob3N0d3JpdGluZ2FjYWRlbXkuY29tLw==
)) is how to quickly solve this by desensitizing you to charging
more.

*****************************************************************
Faulty Belief #4: ‚ÄúMy niche got saturated. I think it‚Äôs time to
pivot.‚Äù
*****************************************************************

This is another pattern I‚Äôve observed a thousand times.

A writer steps into a niche. They land a few clients quickly and
they think they‚Äôve struck gold. They‚Äôre a genius!

Then, two or three months later, a couple of those clients churn.
And immediately the writer thinks the niche is dead and the offer
doesn‚Äôt work anymore. They rush into pivoting their niche.

Here‚Äôs the truth:

Neither of these extremes is correct.

* You aren‚Äôt a genius just because you landed three clients back
to back.
* And your business also isn‚Äôt dead just because a couple of
clients churned.

The skill to build here is about managing the highs and lows of
running a business. When something is trending down, you have to
be level-headed enough to realize that it‚Äôs temporary. You know
the levers to push and pull to land your next couple of clients.

But don‚Äôt fall into the trap of thinking you‚Äôre a genius again!

*******************************************
Faulty Belief #5: ‚ÄúI need to hire someone.‚Äù
*******************************************

Here‚Äôs how this one typically plays out:

Once a ghostwriter is making $10k/month (or higher), they
immediately think, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm swamped I need to hire someone!‚Äù

So they try to jump too quickly to the next level. But all hiring
does is compound all their existing problems. I know because I
made this mistake over and over again building my ghostwriting
agency (all the way up to $180,000 per month).

Here are some golden rules I learned the hard way:

* If your business isn‚Äôt enjoyable now, hiring someone isn‚Äôt
going to make it enjoyable.
* If your business isn‚Äôt profitable now, hiring someone isn‚Äôt
going to make it more profitable.
* If your business is inefficient now, hiring someone isn‚Äôt just
going to magically make it efficient.

One of the biggest faulty beliefs in business is thinking once I
hire someone then it‚Äôll be easier.

Before you hire, you need to get your one-person business working
efficiently and profitably:

* You need to dial in the offer.
* You need to raise your prices.
* You need to perfect client fulfillment.

Only when the business is running smoothly and you have plenty of
margin to play with do you hire someone to take over a set of
responsibilities in the business.

*****************************************************************
Faulty Belief #6: ‚ÄúIf I share too much with the client on the
sales call, they won‚Äôt need me anymore.‚Äù
*****************************************************************

Everyone has this faulty belief, even some of the smartest CEOs I
know.

The fear is that if you give away too much away for free, then no
one will want to buy from you. But the opposite is true. The more
you give, the more people trust and buy from you.

Instead, on sales calls share everything:

* Strategy
* Execution steps
* Potential pitfalls

Then I use this one-liner: ‚ÄúWhether or not we work together, I
just want you to be successful.‚Äù

And boom! This disarms them because you‚Äôre not pitching them
anything. You‚Äôre just sharing everything you know, as if you were
friends. And they often respond: ‚ÄúThis sounds like a lot‚Äîcan I
just hire you?‚Äù

The strategy is free, but the execution is expensive.

This is the ‚ÄúFree Consulting‚Äù strategy I teach inside our Premium
Ghostwriting Academy.

We teach you how to find problems, spot opportunities, and create
outcomes people want in their businesses. Then you give, give,
give until the person‚Äôs practically throwing money at you.

So if you‚Äôve been trying to land clients by scraping leads from
LinkedIn or spamming people with an email automation tool, try
this.

************************************************
Faulty Belief #7: ‚ÄúI need to build an audience.‚Äù
************************************************

You don‚Äôt need:

* A podcast
* A newsletter
* Or to build your audience in any other way

If you‚Äôre under $20K/month, focus solely on cold outreach and
free consulting.

I scaled my agency to $180K/month with no audience, no
newsletter, no podcast. We just mastered these two skills and
reached a 50% close rate on our sales calls. This gave us tons of
business to deliver on. Everything else was a distraction.

Because that‚Äôs the beauty of services. You only need two clients
to double your revenue. It‚Äôs that simple.

And trying to get them through building an audience is how you
play this game on hard mode.

*********************************************************
Faulty Belief #8: ‚ÄúI can just figure this out on my own.‚Äù
*********************************************************

You can try and figure it out on your own or you can simply pay
for the answer.

Because figuring it out on your own will take you:

* Years of mistakes
* Hours of frustration
* And days of second-guessing yourself in your business

You‚Äôll make all the same mistakes I did. And that‚Äôs why I created
PGA, because I want more writers to escape the overworked and
underpaid clich√© of the freelance writer. I just want you to be
successful!

Because no matter what you choose in life, it will always take
you twice as long and cost you twice as much as you expected. So
let‚Äôs shortcut that process.

I‚Äôm not telling you this because you‚Äôre not smart or capable. I‚Äôm
explaining this because I don‚Äôt want you to hit a brick wall and
then throw in the towel because you‚Äôre so frustrated.

I say this as someone who has spent $196,000 on one coaching
program over the last 3 years (yes, that‚Äôs $68,000 per year!).
But this small investment has helped us to scale to $5 million in
revenue this year.

Nicolas Cole üö¢-->

@Nicolascole77

I have made every investment in myself ROI positive. Whether it
was a $10 book or paying $68,000 to join a mastermind, I made
sure I got my money's worth. It's never a question of whether
something "works." It's whether you decide to make it work for
you. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/x0hph3uw50rqq0hg/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODM2MzU5NzQ1MjkwMDE0ODEz
)
4:0 AM ‚Ä¢ Sep 18, 2024

4
Retweets
95
Likes

Read 27 replies (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/e5uw7qqv2wc7hpzx9qmu8h895e222bl/x0hph3uw50rqq0hg/aHR0cHM6Ly94LmNvbS9OaWNvbGFzY29sZTc3L3N0YXR1cy8xODM2MzU5NzQ1MjkwMDE0ODEz
)
‚Äã
So it‚Äôs been completely worth it.

With education, you‚Äôre not really paying for the information.
-------------------------------------------------------------

The primary value is being able to:

* Ask questions when you‚Äôre stuck
* Make an informed decision using the experience of others
* Stress-test your thinking with people who‚Äôve done exactly what
you need to do

And more.

As someone who built an agency without any outside resources or
help, let me tell you it was very, very painful and lonely. I
wish someone could have asked someone about all the problems that
came up in the business so I didn‚Äôt keep making the same mistakes
over and over.

I would have saved myself a lot of stressful nights.

That‚Äôs it!

Cole

Co-Founder, Premium Ghostwriting Academy

PS‚Ä¶ Want more help beating these faulty beliefs?

‚ÄãClick here to kickstart your ghostwriting side hustle and get
paid to write for a living. (

Need some help crossing the goal line? Follow these 3 steps.




1
Find the right course
Everyone has different learning preferences. With thousands of courses and instructors, Udemy gives you the freedom to pick what fits you best.








2
Set a schedule
Setting a routine is key ‚Äî pick a time of day to learn and stick with it. We make it easy with lifetime access to each one of our on-demand courses.








3
Show off your skills
Help your hard work lead to opportunity. Download your certificate of completion and share it with others.












Learn anytime, anywhere with our mobile app.
Make learning a healthy habit

Subject: How a beginner writer made $5,000,000
Body Text:
Hey! Dickie here.

And that "beginner writer" I talk about in the subject line?

Yup, that‚Äôs me.

Today, I want to share my journey from being stuck in a
soul-sucking corporate job on Wall Street to, 5 years later,
making $5,000,000 selling a digital product on the internet.

And I don‚Äôt tell this story to brag.

No, I tell it so you can see that I was once just like you‚ÄîI
didn‚Äôt have a digital product to sell, and I was just trying to
figure things out as I went along.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Back in early 2020, I started a newsletter‚Äîeven though I hated
writing in college.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

I‚Äôd seen how people who could write got the best projects, were
promoted quicker, and were the most respected at the hedge fund I
worked at.

But my weekly newsletters were only being read by my mom and my
sister‚Äîand while their feedback was great, I knew I needed a
faster way to improve my skills.

So, to try and get more eyeballs on my writing, I started
publishing on X (Twitter).

I set myself a challenge:

*******************************************************
Write & publish a Twitter thread every day for 30 days.
*******************************************************

I‚Äôd curate my takeaways from all the podcasts I was listening to
every morning before my 9 to 5 on Wall Street.

After all, what did I have to lose?

* Worst-case scenario: I‚Äôd clarify my thinking by writing about
my favorite investors, entrepreneurs, and creators.
‚Äã
* Best-case scenario: something else would happen to make it
worthwhile (this could‚Äôve been anything, I had no idea what to
expect).

After 27 days, I was seeing almost zero progress:

* Barely any likes
* Hardly any comments
* And a disappointingly low number of shares

I published my 28th thread and went to bed, thinking nothing of
it.

*****************************************************************
Overnight, the thread went viral and I woke up to hundreds of new
followers.
*****************************************************************

Naval Ravikant had retweeted the thread.

And people started sending me DMs, thanking me for pulling
together all the material (which was a break down of the thinking
of Balaji Srinivasan, an entrepreneur and investor I looked up
to).

This blew my mind‚Äîand I knew I was onto something with this
30-day challenge idea.

A simple daily writing habit and publishing ideas on the internet
had caught the attention of people I admired so I decided it
would be fun to help other people do this too.

So, one Tuesday evening, I tweeted this:

‚Äã

-----------------------------------------------------------------
I only had around 1,000 followers at the time‚Äîso I wasn‚Äôt sure if
it‚Äôd get much traction.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

But after tweeting about this ‚Äúaccountability group‚Äù I was
making, all of a sudden 50+ people were paying money to join what
quickly became the 1st cohort of Ship 30 for 30.

And creating this first cohort is how I got put in contact with
my co-founder, Nicolas Cole.

Fast forward 12 months, Ship 30 was doing 7 figures (!) in
revenue.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Of course, this isn‚Äôt to say it was plain sailing all the way.

Cole and I have made a TON of mistakes and learned some hard
lessons over the last 5 years.

As Digital Product Builders, we had to quickly master the 4
pillars we walk through inside Low-Ticket Launchpad (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/gku5p88dl5iwudd776rurh8gxxv99bm/x0he7vr8b3uep8wrp0fg/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
).

*****************************************************************
To build and scale Ship 30, I was frantically figuring out these
skills:
*****************************************************************

* Pillar #1: Product Creation. I‚Äôd found an idea that seemed to
work, but it would take me months to turn it into a profitable
product that solved my target customer‚Äôs problems AND delivered
real outcomes.
‚Äã
* Pillar #2: Product Offer & Pricing. It took me months to slowly
increase the price of Ship 30 from $50‚Ä¶ to $99‚Ä¶ and eventually
$350+. But if I‚Äôd know how to build an irresistible product offer
right from the start, I would‚Äôve been able to charge a lot more,
a lot sooner.
‚Äã
* Pillar #3: Product Tech Stack. I had no idea how to build a
‚Äúdigital product engine‚Äù that could sell for me on autopilot,
24/7/365. I tested dozens of pieces of software, and only now do
I feel like our engine is humming.
‚Äã
* Pillar #4: Product Marketing & Monetization. After years of
experimenting with different content strategies, I‚Äôve finally
figured out how to generate attention, capture it, and then turn
impressions into customers through email and word-of-mouth
marketing.

But the overwhelmingly positive response I got from the first
cohort of Ship 30 for 30 is what convinced me to continue
building myself as a writer online‚Äîand perfecting these skills.

Because mastering these Pillars is what helped me make 7 figures
from Ship 30 in the first 12 months and then over $5,000,000
since then.

This is why I am so excited to help YOU become a Digital Product
Builder with Low-Ticket Launchpad.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

This is the exact roadmap I wish I had when I first start writing
online in early 2020.

So, instead of fumbling your way through months (and even years)
of mistakes and hard lessons trying to build a digital product by
yourself, fast track your progress with us.

*************************************************************
And remember: our first time-sensitive bonus expires tonight!
*************************************************************

So if you don‚Äôt invest in Low-Ticket Launchpad before midnight
EST, tonight, you‚Äôll lose access to our first bonus: The Viral
Drop Playbook.

‚Äã
We‚Äôve used this playbook to attract thousands of subscribers to
our list (and we, to this day, use it every single week!).

Inside this bonus module, we‚Äôll walk you through how to:

* Create the perfect Viral Drop asset (so people will actually
comment on your post)
‚Äã
* Write high-converting social media copy to drive massive
engagement
‚Äã
* Set up an automated delivery system to deliver the asset
‚Äã
* Write a simple email flow to nurture your new subscriber & land
sales (all on autopilot)

If you‚Äôve been struggling to grow your email list organically
(and sell more products), this is the fastest, most
cost-effective growth strategy we‚Äôve ever developed.

But if you don‚Äôt purchase before midnight EST tonight, you‚Äôll
lose access to it‚Ä¶ forever!

-----------------------------------------------------------------
‚ÄãClick here to get Low-Ticket Launchpad (and claim your bonuses
before it‚Äôs too late!). (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/gku5p88dl5iwudd776rurh8gxxv99bm/x0he7vr8b3uep8wrp0fg/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
)‚Äã
-----------------------------------------------------------------

See you on the inside!

‚ÄîDickie

PS‚Ä¶ Worried this is another ‚Äúall fluff, no action‚Äù course?

Well, I can tell you, I‚Äôm ALLERGIC to those kind of courses.

(Yup, I‚Äôve wasted hundreds‚Äîif not thousands of dollars on them,
too).

So that‚Äôs why I create digital products packed with video
explainers, AI prompts, examples, templates and more.

This is everything you need to build your own $350 digital
product‚Äîfrom two guys who‚Äôve done it over and over again (so we
know this stuff really works!).

‚ÄãClick here to join Low-Ticket Launchpad & finally start
monetizing all the knowledge inside your head. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/gku5p88dl5iwudd776rurh8gxxv99bm/x0he7vr8b3uep8wrp0fg/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
)‚Äã

‚Äã

If you'd like to update your email settings, choose one of the
options below:

* No longer want to get updates about our new product, Low Ticket
Launchpad? Don't worry‚Äîclick here to opt-out from any future

)‚Äã

Subject: Forget Resolutions, Build Systems üöÄ
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

Before we kick things off, in case you missed it, I‚Äôm running a a
live, virtual productivity summit on 4-5 January 2025, designed
to help you plan your most productive year yet and start taking
immediate action on your biggest goals.

I‚Äôll be running a bunch of sessions, we have a few different
guest workshops, and you can upgrade after registering for VIP
access (giving you access to all the summit recordings, 2 live
bonus workshops from me on AI Productivity, and more).

So, if you‚Äôre interested you can register for free here:

-->Register for Productivity Spark 2025 for FREE (
https://click.convertkit-mail2.com/mvu2vm8x35t5hqkogq2umhrzm30qqf3/p8hehquzp43dwpbr/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbGlhYmRhYWwuY29tL3NwYXJr
)
Register for Productivity Spark 2025 for FREE (
https://aliabdaal.com/spark )
Anyway, back to this week's email...

In 1994, Pixar released one of my favourite movies and the first
full-length animated film, Toy Story.

It was groundbreaking ‚Äî the first entirely computer-animated
movie ever made ‚Äî and it set the stage for a legacy of
storytelling magic.

‚Äã
But here‚Äôs the thing about Pixar: their success isn‚Äôt just about
brilliant ideas or creative geniuses. It‚Äôs about their process.

And at the heart of this process is something they call the
Braintrust.

The Braintrust is a feedback system that Pixar uses for every
single film, where the studio‚Äôs most experienced storytellers
meet to review rough drafts of each project.

These sessions are known for their brutal honesty. There‚Äôs no
sugarcoating. No egos. Just raw constructive criticism designed
to identify problems and push each project forward.

Take Toy Story 2, for example. Early drafts of the film were
apparently pretty terrible.

The story was disjointed, the characters felt one-dimensional,
and the pacing didn‚Äôt work. In a traditional system, this might
have led to a panicked scramble or shelving the project entirely.

But, at Pixar, the Braintrust helped the team break the film
down, problem by problem. Over months of reflection, reworking,
and iteration, Toy Story 2 transformed into the masterpiece that
we now all know and love.

And, so, this is the real secret to their magic. Their ideas are
good, sure. But, it‚Äôs the systems they have in place that turn
those ideas into something extraordinary.

The Power of Reflection
-----------------------

The Braintrust‚Äôs focus on deliberate reflection isn‚Äôt just unique
to Pixar, of course. It‚Äôs something we should also be doing in
our own lives.

Psychologist Anders Ericsson, in his research on deliberate
practice, found that the best performers in any field don‚Äôt just
practice more ‚Äî they practice smarter. They constantly reflect on
their performance, identify weaknesses, and tweak their approach.

It‚Äôs the same reason journaling is such a powerful tool.

Studies published in The European Journal of Social Psychology
show that writing about our experiences ‚Äî even for just a few
minutes a day ‚Äî helps us process challenges, clarify our goals,
and improve decision-making.

Pixar‚Äôs Braintrust, in many ways, functions like a company-wide
journal. It‚Äôs a built-in system for reflection and improvement,
ensuring that no project, no matter how ambitious, veers too far
off track.

Iteration Over Perfection
-------------------------

Pixar‚Äôs story also reminds me of an idea James Clear explores in
Atomic Habits: the idea that success is built on small,
consistent improvements (rather than one-off bursts of effort).

In fact, researchers call this the aggregation of marginal gains.
Coined by Sir Dave Brailsford during his tenure with British
Cycling, it‚Äôs the idea that improving by just 1% in multiple
areas compounds into extraordinary results.

Pixar embodies this principle. Their films don‚Äôt emerge fully
formed, of course. They‚Äôre the result of hundreds of small
iterations ‚Äî each Braintrust meeting, each edit, each tweak ‚Äî
compounding over time into something incredible.

Ed Catmull, one of the studio‚Äôs co-founders, writes in
Creativity, Inc. that ‚Äúearly on, all of our movies suck.‚Äù But
they don‚Äôt aim for perfection from the start. Instead, they
embrace the process of iteration, knowing that greatness comes
from the willingness to improve, step by step.

So, the takeaway here is that whether you‚Äôre working on a
creative project, building a habit, or chasing a big goal, the
magic doesn‚Äôt happen all at once. It‚Äôs not about waiting for
inspiration to strike or getting it perfect on the first try.

The magic is in the process: reflecting, refining, and showing up
consistently. That‚Äôs how ideas turn into achievements ‚Äî and how
something good becomes something great.

Speak soon,

Ali xx

Subject: A question for Candace
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

¬†

If you‚Äôve been searching for a way to make a difference your whole life‚Ä¶

¬†

If you finally feel ready to begin a new career that fulfills you‚Ä¶

¬†

I have an offer that‚Äôs going to change everything for you. ( https://pages.jayshettycoaching.com/c2c-video-bau-e/?el=C2C-email-question-173-5&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+173-5&utm_content_name=A+question+for+Name&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )

¬†

¬†

Jay Shetty Certification School ( https://pages.jayshettycoaching.com/c2c-video-bau-e/?el=C2C-email-question-173-5&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+173-5&utm_content_name=A+question+for+Name&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )¬†is changing 1 billion lives through the power of intentional coaching, wisdom, and education.

¬†

As professional Life Coaches, we transform the world one person at a time by using evidence-based coaching methods to improve the emotional and mental well-being of our clients.

¬†

And we need people like you to make it happen.

¬†

Someone who understands their values and passions.

¬†

Someone who strives to be the best version of themselves every day.

¬†

Someone who is unafraid to use their talents to help the people around them.

¬†

If this sounds like you, click here to begin your coaching journey today ( https://pages.jayshettycoaching.com/c2c-video-bau-e/?el=C2C-email-question-173-5&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+173-5&utm_content_name=A+question+for+Name&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )!

I believe there‚Äôs nothing more fulfilling and meaningful than being a Life Coach.

¬†

Find out now for yourself. üíô

Subject: Upgrade To Professional Coach by July ‚òÄÔ∏è
Body Text:
Candace...

¬†

Have you ever noticed that people always come to you for advice?

¬†

They trust you‚Ä¶

¬†

And you genuinely love to listen.

¬†

That‚Äôs not a coincidence.

¬†

You have a gift, Candace¬†üéÅ

¬†

Now imagine if you had the tools, techniques, and support to turn your gift into your professional career.

¬†

So you can serve more people‚Ä¶make an even bigger impact‚Ä¶and maybe even get paid for doing what comes naturally to you.

¬†

My team and I have helped over 6,000 students & graduates do exactly this.

¬†

And if you apply before Friday ( https://call.jayshettycoaching.com/?el=booking-email-professional-coach-161-2&utm_campaign=booking-be&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+161-2&utm_content_name=Upgrade+To+Professional+Coach+by+July+%E2%98%80%EF%B8%8F&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io ), we can help you too.

¬†

Giving you everything you need to become a certified, confident coach by July through the Jay Shetty Certification School.

¬†

Honestly‚Ä¶

¬†

The question isn‚Äôt if you can do this.

¬†

The question is - how many more lives will you change once you do?

¬†

‚è≥ Time is running out to get started‚Ä¶

¬†

Enrollment closes FRIDAY.

¬†

Click here to apply before enrollment closes on Friday. Hi Candace,

¬†

If you meant to book a coaching session but time got away from you‚Äîgood news. We‚Äôve extended the 14% off offer for one more week!

Subject: What‚Äôs your purpose?
Body Text:
Hey Candace,

¬†

Earlier today, we celebrated a new class of students graduating from the Jay Shetty Certification School.

¬†

Each one is now ready to explore a new chapter as a certified coach.

¬†

But there's one graduate story I can't stop thinking about...

¬†

Maha‚Ä¶

¬†

She was always that person in everyone's life.

¬†

You know the one.

* The friend who actually listened when you called at 2am.
*
The coworker who stayed late to help with your project.
* The shoulder that was always available when tears needed to fall.
¬†

For Maha, helping others isn't just something she did...

¬†

It‚Äôs who she is.

¬†

But somewhere amongst all the busyness of life, Maha drifted away from that.

¬†

Her purpose got pushed to one side.

¬†

¬†

Then 2024, she hit a moment she‚Äôll never forget.

¬†

She lost her brother.

¬†

In that space of grief, she found herself questioning everything she was doing:

¬†

"What's my purpose here?"

¬†

"What am I actually meant to be doing with my life?"

¬†

That's when she discovered my school.

¬†

And something about it just clicked.

¬†

In her words: "The best decision I've ever made."

¬†

First - the transformation was personal.

¬†

She applied everything she learned about coaching to herself.

¬†

Then - she began working with clients and fellow coaches...

¬†

And saw that impact rippled outward.

¬†

Finally, she‚Äôd found her purpose.

¬†

Her way to help others in a way she was always meant to.

¬†

Today, Maha is a certified, Self Love & Confidence Coach.

¬†

Ready to welcome her first paying clients.

¬†

¬†

If you've been reading stories like Maha's and wondering if this could be you‚Ä¶

¬†

Maybe it‚Äôs time to find out?

¬†

We're enrolling a new class of would-be coaches right now, and there's still space for you:

¬†

Click here to apply for the next new class - and become a certified coach by Halloween. ( https://call.jayshettycoaching.com/?el=booking-email-purpose-171-4&utm_campaign=booking-be&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+171-4&utm_content_name=What%E2%80%99s+your+purpose%3F&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )

-Jay Shetty, Jay Shetty Certification School ( https://call.jayshettycoaching.com/?el=booking-email-purpose-171-4&utm_campaign=booking-be&utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+171-4&utm_content_name=What%E2%80%99s+your+purpose%3F&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )
P.S.

¬†

If you missed the graduation earlier you can watch the replay here:

¬†

https://www.facebook.com/jayshettycertificationschool ( https://www.facebook.com/jayshettycertificationschool?utm_campaign_name=JSCS%3A+Prospects+Week+171-4&utm_content_name=What%E2%80%99s+your+purpose%3F&utm_medium_name=email_action&utm_source_name=customer.io )

¬†

(next time maybe it will be you!)

Subject: Jason made $100k selling digital products
Body Text:
Hey there!

Only 3 days left to join Low-Ticket Launchpad (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/gku5p88dl5iwudd7qdwtrh8gxxv99bm/48hk74mgi7umppqv4xbq/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
) and become a Digital Product Builder (so you can start making
internet money on autopilot‚Ä¶ forever).

After that, it‚Äôll no longer be available for sale (even if you
email asking us to open the cart again for you‚Ä¶ and this ALWAYS
happens‚Ä¶ so don‚Äôt be one of those people!).

We want to help you take action. And, talking from experience,
it‚Äôs only by setting deadlines do we ever take action.

Speaking of action takers‚Ä¶

***************************
Introducing Jason Strimpel.
***************************

‚Äã
Today, we want to share a mini-case study of a Digital Builder
who invested in himself to access some of the frameworks we teach
inside Low-Ticket Launchpad.

In a little over a year since investing in our programs, Jason
launched PyQuant News, an X account and newsletter for finance
practitioners.

He helps financial professions improve their Python skills for:

* Data analysis
* Quant finance
* Algorithmic trading

And more.

(Yup‚Ä¶ now that‚Äôs niche‚Ä¶ so if you‚Äôre thinking Low-Ticket
Launchpad won‚Äôt work because your niche is too small‚Ä¶ well, Jason
here is proof it will!)

-----------------------------
But the most impressive part?
-----------------------------

He used our mini-course ‚ÄúWrite The Course‚Äù to build out his own
cohort-based digital product which has made him over $100,000 in
sales.

Write The Course contains just a handful of frameworks we‚Äôve
included in Low-Ticket Launchpad.

(Inside Low-Ticket Launchpad you get so much more‚Äîit‚Äôs our
complete playbook for creating and selling $350 digital products,
our most comprehensive course on digital products EVER.)

But that didn‚Äôt stop Jason from running with them and getting
some incredible results.

He‚Äôs gone from:

* 0 to 100,000+ followers
* Made $14,257 in eBook sales
* Racked up $96,557 in course sales

This screenshot is from a few months before he sent the above
numbers‚Äîso he‚Äôs continued to grow since then!

‚Äã

Jason followed the 4 pillars of being a Digital Product Builder
with this course ‚ÄúGetting Started With Python For Quant Finance‚Äù:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

* Pillar #1: Product Creation. He found a niche, target audience
(finance professionals using Python for Quant Finance) and
created a product that delivered real, tangible outcomes.
‚Äã
* Pillar #2: Product Offer & Pricing. He built an irresistible
product offer and slowly increased the price (spoiler: inside
Low-Ticket Launchpad we show you how to charge $350 straight out
the gate).
‚Äã
* Pillar #3: Product Tech Stack. He has a simple tech setup that
works for him 24/7 (and you don‚Äôt need to be a tech guy like
Jason to do the same).
‚Äã
* Pillar #4: Product Marketing & Monetization. He‚Äôs continued to
write content, grow his audience, and use his newsletter to
promote and sell his products.

And with these frameworks, he made $100,000 in just 3 months.

This goes to show what‚Äôs possible with low-ticket digital
products IF you have the proven frameworks, systems, and
templates needed to build a product your customers actually want.

So‚Ä¶

**********************************************
Ready to create your own $350 digital product?
**********************************************

Unfortunately, most people will read this, have a little spark of
motivation, but then let self-doubt win them over‚Ä¶ so they take
no action and go back to scrolling TikTok.

And 12 months from now, as they‚Äôre still trying to figure out
‚Äúhow to make money on the internet,‚Äù they‚Äôll realize another year
passed them by:

* No progress
* No closer to their goals
* No clue how to get started

And then the cycle will repeat itself.

Again, and again, and again.

Don‚Äôt let that be you.

*****************************************
Remember: your 2nd bonus expires TONIGHT.
*****************************************

And because we like to reward action takers (just like Jason
here), you get our Product Traffic Vault for free when you buy
Low-Ticket Lauchpad‚Ä¶

But it expires at midnight TONIGHT.

‚Äã
These are the top 30 posts we‚Äôve seen crushing across LinkedIn
and X.

And we‚Äôve put them all in one place and templatized them for you.

Inside the vault, you‚Äôll get:

* 30+ post templates to capture attention on social (and why they
work)
* Real examples from viral posts (so you can see them in action)
* Fill-in-the-blank templates you can customize in minutes

So, if you‚Äôre tired of wasting hours creating content that gets
buried by the algorithm, our Product Traffic Vault will give you
immediate access to social post templates that actually get
attention.

And just to show you the kind of results these hooks & styles can
generate, check out this post of Dickie‚Äôs which got 2,000+ likes
& 165 shares:

‚Äã
Plus, you‚Äôll get an AI prompt so you can take any viral post you
see and generate niche-specific content in a matter of seconds.

So, if you‚Äôre ready to create and sell your first $350 digital
product (and attract ready-to-buy customers to your offer)‚Ä¶

And you don‚Äôt want to let another bonus slip through your
fingers‚Ä¶

-----------------------------------------------------------------
‚ÄãClick here to get lifetime access of Low-Ticket Launchpad‚Äîand
join 300+ others productizing their knowledge. (
https://click.convertkit-mail.com/gku5p88dl5iwudd7qdwtrh8gxxv99bm/48hk74mgi7umppqv4xbq/aHR0cHM6Ly9zaGlwLnNhbWNhcnQuY29tL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2xvdy10aWNrZXQtbGF1bmNocGFk
)‚Äã
-----------------------------------------------------------------

See you inside!

Dickie & Cole

PS‚Ä¶ Here‚Äôs a reminder of everything you get inside Low-Ticket
Launchpad:

HOW TO GET INTO THE WORLD'S MOST COMPETITIVE PROGRAMS: THE MATCH ME FORMULA¬Æ [https://profellow.krtra.com/c/VwjEgylmQJlF/xeLlP]¬† ¬† DATE: Friday, August 29, 10am Pacific (U.S.) LENGTH: 1 hour event ¬† If you are applying to fellowships, graduate schools, and dream jobs, don‚Äôt miss this special event!¬† ¬† ProFellow Founder Dr. Vicki Johnson will present on her breakthrough MATCH ME Formula¬Æ, the 7 elements of a winning application. This Formula has helped thousands of ProFellow members get accepted to prestigious fellowships and top graduate schools! ¬† You‚Äôre going to learn: ¬† * How to set yourself up for success when applying to top graduate programs and fellowships * 3 common applicant mistakes and how to avoid them * The MATCH ME FORMULA¬Æ, the 7 elements of a winning application ¬† üçé Free! The workshop will be hosted in Google Meet. ¬† EARLY BIRD REGISTRATION THRU SEP. 4: $99 ($129)_ - save $30!_ ¬† ¬† üçé Register for the Interview Secrets Workshop Here [https://profellow.krtra.com/c/dObo2s7DVnCp/xeLlP] ¬† ¬† WORKSHOP: CREATE AN EXCEPTIONAL STATEMENT OF PURPOSE OR DISSERTATION RESEARCH PROPOSAL [https://profellow.krtra.com/c/QSkayb4hPZXc/xeLlP] ¬† _A 2 hour workshop for PhD and fellowship applicants who are creating a research proposal, with four-time fellow Dr. Vicki Johnson¬†_ If you are applying to doctoral programs and academic fellowships and struggling to put together your research or dissertation proposal, don‚Äôt miss this event with four-time Fellow Dr. Vicki Johnson! In this workshop, you‚Äôll learn * The DIFFERENCE between the statement of purpose and a personal statement, and the hybrid version of both * How to choose a RESEARCH TOPIC that gets funded * How to identify and SUMMARIZE ‚ÄúTHE STATE OF THE SCIENCE‚Äù * Pros and cons of common RESEARCH METHODS and how to choose the right one * What you need to know about HUMAN ETHICS APPROVAL for research involving people * THREE WAYS TO GIVE YOUR RESEARCH PROPOSAL AN ‚ÄúEDGE‚Äù over top applicants >¬†_‚ÄúYour¬†guidance¬†was¬†like¬†a¬†light¬†switch¬†that¬†helped¬†me¬†make¬†sense >¬†of¬†the¬†application¬†process.¬†I¬†learned¬†how¬†to¬†frame¬†my¬†faculty >¬†conversations¬†and¬†prepare¬†my¬†winning¬†research¬†proposal.‚Äù¬†_‚Äì¬† >¬†Paige¬†S.,¬†fully¬†funded¬†PhD¬†candidate¬†at¬†the¬†University¬†of¬†Auckland¬†+ >¬†winner¬†of¬†the¬†university‚Äôs¬†Doctoral¬†Scholarship Register to join LIVE or receive the replay. The workshop will be hosted in Google Meet.
